loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: La Sra. Luz Marina C. B. ella es trabajadora por cuenta propia se dedica al negocio de venta de Mariscos  ya tiene a sus clientes a quienes le vende el producto y sus mismos clientes le mandan  clientes nuevos  tiene siete años  de dedicarse a esta actividad, es Acompañada actualmente  tiene tres  hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  nueve créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado Para la Compra de Productos de Mariscos  y así   invertirle a su negocio y mejorar la condición del negocio, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Luz Marina C. B. is self employed.  She sells seafood.  She has an established base of regular customers she sells the product to.  These customers send new customers to her.  She’s been in business seven years.  She has a life partner and three school age children.

She’s had nine CEPRODEL loans that she’s used to buy seafood thus investing in the business improving its condition.

Ceprodel loans have been of great benefit to her in that they have allowed her to improve her and her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: To buy fuel and seafood.

loans.name: Adama Kamara Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the Adama K.’s group. They are small-scale businesswomen based in Makeni, a city in Northern Sierra Leone. This is the second loan these entrepreneurs are accessing from SMT/Kiva. With this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more profit and consequently improve their standard of living. 

The leader of this group is Adama K.. She is 29 and was born in Makeni, where she is currently residing together with her husband and children. Her husband is a businessman and both of her children are attending primary school. For four years now, Adama has been selling shoes, school bags, and womens’ clothing. With this loan, she will buy more of these items at wholesale to add to her business.

(Also included in the right of the photo is Zainab Bangura, handing over the loan to the borrowers.)

loans.use: To buy shoes, school bags, and womens’ clothing at wholesale to add to her business.

loans.name: Walter Antonio

texts.es: El Sr C.  labora como conductor  es soltero, tiene dos hijos a su cargo,  es el primer  del crédito que CEPRODEL le otorga, da gracia la oportunidad que le brindan esta institución con  este  desembolso, para poder mejorar su vivienda, comprar materiales arena, bloque ,cemento, cinz, piedrín, hierro, mano de obra PARA HACER ANEXO DE CUARTO PARA SU HIJOS YA QUE LA FAMILIA ESTA CRECIENDO.
texts.en: Mr Chavez works as driver. He is single with two dependent children. This is the first loan granted to him by CEPRODEL. He is grateful for the opportunity that the organisation is giving him to improve his house and pay for materials such as sand, blocks, cement, zinc, gravel, iron as well as labour to build an annex room for his children, given that the family is growing.

loans.use: Buy building materials.

loans.name: Jessica Cryseida

texts.es: Jessica Cryseida F. A. de 29 años de edad, reside en el departamento de Santa Ana, lugar en el cual vive junto a su esposo y un hijo de 14 años de edad. Jessica trabaja de lunes a domingo, en su propio negocio el cual es un chalet en el que comercializa desayunos, almuerzos, cenas, antojitos, golosinas, bebidas y otros más. Su negocio cuenta con una excelente ubicación debido a que se encuentre en el hospital de San Juan opico, por lo que sus ventas son bastante grandes. Jessica solicita un préstamo gracias a la cual pueda surtir los productos de su negocios, de manera que pueda ofrecer mayor cantidad de productos alimenticios a los cientos de personas que visitan el hospital, de esta manera ella espera mejorar sus ventas y mejorar considerablemente la economía familiar de su hogar.
texts.en:
Jessica Cryseida F. A. is 29 years old and lives in the Department of Santa Ana with her husband and 14 year old son. She works Monday through Sunday at her own business, a snack bar where she serves breakfast, lunch, dinner, sweets, appetizers, drinks, and other items. Her business is situated in an excellent location near the hospital in San Juan Opico. She is able to generate many sales.

Jessica is requesting a loan so that she can restock her business with supplies, thereby allowing her to offer more food items to those people who are visiting the hospital. She hopes to increase her sales and considerably improve her family’s household finances.

loans.use: Restock her business with supplies

loans.name: Silvia Patricia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Silvia Patricia; la socia tiene 44 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; la socia se dedica al negocio de carpintería metálica ella trabaja conjuntamente con su esposo llevan años en este negocio del cual se siente feliz ya que mediante este negocio ella saca a su familia adelante, a la vez la socia trabaja en una ONG como madre sustituta cuidando a niños que no tienen papas esta actividad le gusta mucho ya que puede ayudar a niños que necesitan cariño. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de una maquina de soldar para su negocio ya que con este instrumento le será más fácil realizar su trabajo.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Silvia Patricia is a member of the Communal Bank “Kantu de San Jeronimo” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 44 years old, in a common law marriage, and has three children. Silvia manages a metal shop where she and her husband have worked together for several years. She is pleased with her business because it has enabled her family to get ahead. At one time she worked for an NGO as a foster mother who took care of orphans. She enjoyed that job very much because was able to provide the love these children needed.

Silvia is requesting a loan to buy a soldering machine for her business since it will help make her job easier. She is happy to receive this loan and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase a soldering machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase new & used tires

loans.name: David Pastor

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. David Pastor; el tiene 48 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; el socio tiene su mecánica de soldar donde suelda todo tipo de fierros,carros entre otros y tambien hace trabajos con este material como estantes,el trabaja años en este negocio conjuntamente con su esposa del cual se siente feliz ya que mediante esta actividad el saca  a su familia adelante, el socio es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de una maquina de soldar para facilitarle su trabajo.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Sr. David Pastor is a member of the Communal Bank “Kantu de San Jeronimo” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

He is 48 years old, in a common law marriage, and has three children.  David has a business where he has worked as a welder for several years.  Both he and his wife manage this business together.  David is pleased that his business has helped his family move forward.  He is a cheerful person who is eager to succeed.

David is requesting a loan to buy a soldering machine to facilitate his work.  He is happy to have this loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: Purchase a soldering machine

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Maribel. La socia tiene 34 años de edad, la socia  es casada y tiene 2 hijos de (14,  5),  la socia es asesora de ventas de claro, ella también puso en su casa un negocio de internet y un locutorio, la socia desea invertir el préstamo esta vez en la compra de papeles y de una impresora a color, ella tiene un pequeño ahorro y sobre este ahorro aumentaría este monto para realizar la compra. La socia desea el préstamo para invertir en la compra de una impresora a color y de papeles para la impresora.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Maribel is a member of the Communal Bank “Kantu de San Jeronimo” which is located in the District of Huanchac, Province and Department of Cusco.

She is 34 years old, married, and has two children (ages 14 and 5). Maribel works as a sales representative for Claro (a telecommunications company), but she also manages an Internet café and call center from her home. She wants to invest her loan in the purchase of paper and a color printer. Maribel has some money saved up, but she needs a little bit more in order to make this purchase. The funds will be used to buy a color printer and the paper to go with it.

Maribel is happy to receive this loan and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase a color printer & paper

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es: Rosa María L. P. de 50 años de edad, reside en el cantón primavera, ubicado en la cabecera departamental de Santa Ana. Su grupo familiar está conformado únicamente por su compañero de vida. Ella posee una tienda en la cual comercializa productos perecederos, la cual le deja muy buenas ganancias, debido a que es una de las tiendas más fuertes del sector y también gracias a su excelente ubicación la cual es estar ubicada sobre calle principal, a la vista de todas las personas que transitan por ese lugar. Rosa solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar más productos para surtir la tienda, así mismo desea comprar frutas y verduras al por mayor para poder vender otro tipo de productos en su tienda y de esta manera mejorar sus ganancias, las cuales serán de gran beneficio para su hogar.
texts.en: Rosa Maria L. Pleitez is 50 years old and lives in the Primavera neighbourhood, located in Santa Ana, the province capital. Her family unit is made up of herself and her life partner. She owns a store where she sells perishable goods. It provides her with good profits, as it's one of the best shops of its kind and also thanks to its excellent location, right on the main street, within view of everyone passing through there. Rosa is requesting a loan to buy more products to stock her store. She would also like to buy fruits and vegetables in bulk to widen the type of products sold in her store and thus increase her profits, which will be very beneficial for her family unit.

loans.use: Buy perishable goods.

location.town: cantón primavera, departamento de Santa Ana

loans.name: Francisco José

texts.es: El Sr C.  labora como conductor  es acompañado, tiene dos hijos a su cargo,  es el primer  del crédito que CEPRODEL le otorga,  la oportunidad que le brindan esta institución con  este  desembolso, para poder mejorar su vivienda, comprar materiales arena, bloque ,cemento, cinz, piedrín, hierro, mano de obra.construire paded de mi casa que es de madera que  esta en  mal estado.
texts.en:
Mr. C. works as a driver and has a live-in parter and two children in his care.  This is his first loan through CEPRODEL.  He plans to use the loan to make home improvements and buy materials such as sand, bricks, cement, zinc, gravel, and iron.

He plans to build the walls of his house which are currently made of wood and in disrepair.

loans.use: To buy construction materials

loans.name: Work Together Group

texts.en:
Meet the members of the “Work Together” group from Makeni, a city in northern Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan of SLL 800,000 each. With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales, and consequently improve on their living conditions. 

Aminata Sesay I is the leader of this group. The 50 year old is a widow with two grown children. Aminata has been a businesswoman for more than 15 years now, and she sells palm-oil, rice, fish, onions, soaps, etc.  With her share of this loan, she will buy the above mentioned items at wholesale to add to her current ones. 

(Also included in the right of the photo is loan officer Zainab B. handing over the loan to the borrowers).

loans.use: To buy palm-oil, rice, fish, onions, soaps, etc. at wholesale to add to her business.

loans.name: María Dalila

texts.es: María Dalila R. D. A. D. 53 años D. edad, resiD. sola en el municipio D. San Martín, en el departamento D. San Salvador. Ella posee una tienda D. productos perecederos, la cual es D. mucha ayuda para su propio sostenimiento, debido a que es la única fuente D. ingresos fijos que posee. En su lugar D. residencia es muy conocida ya que desD. hace 15 años que posee esta tienda, misma razón por la que cuenta con una cantidad bastante amplia D. clientes. María solicita un préstamo por medio del cual cuente con la capacidad D. poder comprar granos básicos, verduras, pan. Golosinas y otros productos más los cuales son muy solicitados en el negocio. Ella alberga la esperanza D. que este sea un año diferente en el cual pueda mejorar sus ganancias y D. esta manera  poder contar con todo lo necesario para tener una vida digna y estable.
texts.en: María Dalila R. D. A. is 53-years-old. She lives in the municipality of San Martín in the department of San Salvador. She owns a food store which helps her support herself because it's the only source of income she has. She's well-known in her place of residence because she's had this store for 15 years, which is also why she has a large number of customers. María is requesting this loan for the means by which to be able to buy basic grains, vegetables, bread, candy, and other high-demand products. She cherishes the hope that this will be the year in which she's able to increase her income and have everything necessary to live a dignified and stable life.

loans.use: Purchase of essential items

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gladis; la socia tiene 44 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de desayunos ella trabaja de forma ambulatoria a la vez también trabaja en un kiosco escolar en un colegio nacional, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para realizar los desayunos que realiza.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This partner belongs to the communal bank ”KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; the bank is located in the Cusco district in the province and department of Cusco.

Gladis is 44-years-old. She lives with her partner and 3 children. She alternates between daily chores and her business of selling breakfast. She also works at a kiosk in a public school. She's a pretty happy person and she's eager to get ahead.

She's requesting this loan to buy ingredients for making breakfast. 

She's happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase of ingredients for making breakfast

loans.name: Leopoldo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Leopoldo; el tiene 32 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; el socio trabaja realizando el mantenimiento de los hoteles en la mecánica de producción el lleva un buen tiempo en este trabajo el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto personales y económicas, el socio es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de herramientas para facilitar su trabajo.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Sr. Leopoldo is a member of the Communal Bank “Kantu de San Jeronimo” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

He is 32 years old, married, and has two children. Leopoldo works as a production mechanic, performing maintenance jobs at various hotels. He has done this work for a long time and it has given him great satisfaction, both personally and financially. Leopoldo is a cheerful person who is eager to succeed. The loan he is requesting will be used to purchase tools to facilitate his work.

Leopoldo is happy to receive this loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: Purchase tools for work

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Believe In God Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are members of the “Believe in God” group from Makeni, a city in northern Sierra Leone. They run small businesses and have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, in order to receive a second loan. With this loan, they will be able to add more goods to their businesses, attract more customers, make more sales and profit, and consequently improve their living conditions. 

The leader of this group is Umu J.. She is 33 years old and has three school-aged children. Umu has a small trading business where she sells milk, sugar, and cocoa. With her share of this loan, she will buy more of these goods in bulk to sell.

loans.use: To buy milk, sugar, and cocoa in bulk to sell.

loans.name: Yendy

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Yendy. La socia tiene 22 años de edad, la socia  es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos de (6 y 6 meses), la socia tiene el apoyo de sus padres y de su conyugue, ella trabaja comprando al por mayor verduras del mercado de Huancaro en la ciudad del Cusco y lo lleva a Puerto Maldonado, ella vende en este departamento y cuando esta no se encuentra en Cusco sus padres le hacen el envió para ella recoger la mercadería y venderlo en Puerto Maldonado. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería (verduras), para enviarlo a Puerto Maldonado.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Yendy is a member of the Communal Bank “Kantu de San Jeronimo” which is located in the District of Huanchac, Province and Department of Cusco.

She is 22 years old, in a common law marriage, and has two children (a six year old and a six month old). Yendy has the support of her parents and her husband. She buys vegetables in bulk at the Huancaro Market in Cusco and then brings them to Puerto Maldonado to sell. When she is not able to get to Cusco, her parents ship the vegetables so that she can pick them up to sell in Puerto Maldonado. Yendy is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of vegetables that she can bring to Puerto Maldonado.

She is happy with the loan that has been provided and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase vegetables to sell

loans.name: Penn

texts.en:
Penn P. S. was born in 1962, she is married to Penn Pius Ndoh, and they are blessed with seven children. Their family lives at Foncha Street, a neighbourhood in Nkwen Bamenda, in the North West Region of Cameroon.

P. has faced some challenges in life. She has been struggling to raise these children with the help of her husband. She faces difficulties providing for their school needs, especially payment of their school fees on time. She has successfully borrowed and repaid loans seven times with GHAPE since 2002. She plans to invest this loan in a provision store which will contain rice, beans, palm oil, groundnut oil, savon, magi, salt, and the sale of firewood. She has been in this for a long time now, and success is her watch word. She believes the business will succeed because she has targeted a period where there will be scarcity of firewood and at that time it will be expensive. The loan will help her community because they will be able to buy firewood and other items in her provision store at affordable prices.

P. will plough back her profit into her business and use part to care for her family. Her children’s school needs will be taken care of. She prefers GHAPE because of the training she frequently receives and the method of obtaining and paying back the loan.

About GHAPE 
The Grounded and Holistic Approach to People's Empowerment (GHAPE) is a non-profit NGO based in Bamenda, Cameroon. GHAPE works towards the empowerment of the poor and poverty alleviation through a highly multi-faceted approach.  Every client is trained in business management, basic health, life skills, financial management, profits and losses, and family values.  Clients are also required to contribute a small amount into a personal savings account; most clients save much more than the minimum requirement.  GHAPE instils a sense of family and community within its clients and staff and has developed a strong bond of trust between the organization and its clients.

loans.use: To buy palm oil, groundnut oil, rice, savon, firewood.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Beatriz; la socia tiene 41 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche también vende otro tipo de productos como golosinas, aceite entre otros, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de productos para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO” communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cuzco, which belongs to the province and department of Cuzco.  

The member is named Beatriz. She is 41 years old, in a common law marriage and as 1 child. The alternates her daily activities with her grocery store business. She sells basic necessity products such as rice, sugar and milk. She also sells other types of product such as candies and oil, among others. She is a cheerful person who really wants to get ahead.  

The member is asking for the loan to buy products for her business. She is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: The member is asking for the loan to buy products for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Wholesale purchase of maize

loans.name: Ayde Marisol

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ayde Marisol; la socia tiene 41 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche también vende otro tipo de productos como golosinas, aceite entre otros, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de productos para su negocio y así tener más variedad de productos que ofrecer a sus clientes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ayde Marisol is a member of the "KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province, in Cusco department.

Ayde Marisol is 41 years old, lives with her partner, and has 1 child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her grocery store business.  She sells essentials such as rice, sugar and milk.  She also sells other products such as candy, oil, etc.  She is a very cheerful person who has a great desire to get ahead in life.

Ayde Marisol is requesting this loan to buy products for her business, so that she will have a greater variety of products to offer her customers.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy products for her business, so that she will have a greater variety of products to offer her customers

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: EL Sr. Jorge Alberto R. L. él es trabajador por cuenta propia desempeñándose como mecánico tiene veinte  años  de trabajar por cuenta propia, el brinda su servicio en donde lo contraten y al mismo tiempo tiene un pequeño taller en su casa de habitación,  es casado  actualmente, tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  siete créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción tales como Arena, zinc, cemento, piedra, bloques, Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con Ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Jorge Alberto R. L. has worked as a mechanic for 20 years and has his own business.  He has a small workshop in his house and also works under contract for others.  He is married and has two school-aged children.

He has had seven loans through CEPRODEL which he has used to buy construction materials such as sand, zinc, cement, stone and bricks for home expansion and improvement.

The Ceprodel loans have helped him greatly toward improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy construction materials such as zinc, cement and wood beams

loans.name: Sobresalientes Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama Sobresalientes, el nombre se escogió porque cuando el grupo se estaba formando setaban muy contentas por recibir este crédito, ubicado en el Estado de Hidalgo. El grupo está conformado por 9 integrantes. La señora F. A. Isabel Eugenia es presidenta del grupo, tiene 47 años es madre soltera, estudió hasta la secundaria, tiene un hijo de 14 años. La señora Eugenia se dedica a la venta de abarrotes y recauderia, tiene 2 años con su negocio y solicita el préstamo para poder surtir su negocio y así poder tener mayor variedad y con esto elevar sus ventas. Sus clientes nos comentan que la señora es una excelente vendedora ya que realiza visitas a las casas de sus  vecinas y conocidas, es una mujer trabajadora, amable, de excelente carácter y le gusta mucho a lo que se dedica. Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente muy contenta y feliz por la oportunidad que le dan. Espera que con este credito pueda aumentar sus ventas para tener un mejor desarrollo y satisfacer las necesidades de su familia para poder vivir tranquilamente sin verse en la necesidad de trasladarse a trabajar y descuidar a sus hijos.la entrega del credito. En la foto se observa al grupo de señoras en el comedor muy contentas.
texts.en:
This group is called "Sobresalientes" (Outstanding).  They chose the name because when the group was being formed they all felt very happy to be receiving this loan.  The group is located in the State of Hidalgo and has 9 members.

Mrs Isabel Eugenia F. A. is the group's president.  She is 47 years old and a single mother.  She studied up to high school level and has a 14 year-old son.  Eugenia's business is selling groceries, fruit and vegetables.  She has been in her business for 2 years and is requesting this loan so that she can stock her business and have a greater variety of products available for her customers.  In this way she will increase her sales.

Eugenia's customers tell us that she is an excellent saleswoman since she visits the homes of her neighbors and acquaintances.  She is a hard-working, kind woman of excellent character and she really enjoys her work.  At the time of requesting this loan, Eugenia feels very happy and content to be receiving this opportunity.  She hopes that the loan will help her to increase her sales, make progress in her business and cover her family's needs so that they can live peacefully without her having to go out to work and neglect her children.

In the photo you can see this very happy group of ladies in the dining room.

loans.use: To better stock her business, so that she can have a greater variety of products available

loans.name: Alcira

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Alcira. La socia tiene 42 años de edad, la socia  es casada y tiene 2 hijos de (15 y 6), la socia es consultora de ventas ella trabaja con la empresa de teléfonos celulares Claro y la socia poco a poco está mejorando su casa, ella ahora desea el crédito para terminar de mejorar sus vivienda. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en mejorar sus vivienda.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Alcira is a member of the “KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO” community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province, in Cusco department.

Alcira is 42 years old, married, and has two children aged 15 and 6.  She is a sales consultant for the cell phone company Claro.  Alcira is gradually making improvements to her home and she would like this loan so that she can finish these improvements.  She is requesting the loan to invest in improving her home.

Alcira is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To invest in making improvements to her home

loans.name: Lidia Martha

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MOSOQ ALLPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lidia Martha; la socia tiene 59 años de edad, casada y tiene 4 hijos; la socia se dedica al negocio de tienda de abarrotes ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche también vende otro tipo de productos como golosinas, aceite, gaseosas entre otros más la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de productos para su tienda de abarrotes y así poder tener más variedad de productos que ofrecer.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Lidia Martha is a member of the "MOSOQ ALLPA” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Lidia Martha is 59 years old, married and has 4 children.  She has a grocery store business where she sells essentials such as rice, sugar and milk.  She also sells other products such as candy, oil, soda, etc.  She is a very cheerful person who has a great desire to get her family ahead in life.

Lidia Martha is requesting this loan to buy products for her grocery store, so that she can have a greater variety of products available to offer her customers.  She is happy to be receiving her loan and she pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy products for her grocery store, so that she can have a greater variety of products to offer her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To make home improvements

loans.name: God With Us Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “God With Us” group. They are small scale businesspeople based in Makeni, a city in northern Sierra Leone. This is the second loan that these entrepreneurs are accessing from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of their previous loan, they were able to expand their respective businesses, made more profit and consequently improved their standard of living. They have, however, requested a new loan of SLL 2,900,000 in order to further expand their businesses.

The leader of this group is Daniel G.. Daniel is age 34; he was born in Bo, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. Currently, he is residing in Makeni city together with his wife and 2 children. His wife is a businesswoman and his children are not of school age. For 6 years now, Daniel has been producing and selling bread. With his share of this new loan, he will buy bags of flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, etc. in order to produce a larger quantity of bread for sale.

loans.use: To buy bags of flours, sugar, salt, baking powder, etc. in order to produce a larger quantity of bread for sale.

loans.name: Ricardina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MOSOQ ALLPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ricardina; la socia tiene 58 años de edad, separada y tiene 4 hijos; la socia se dedica al negocio de compra y venta de ropa, la socia viaja hasta la ciudad de Lima para comprar mercadería y así poder tener más variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes, la socia es una persona bien alegre y lleva ya un buen tiempo en este negocio.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ricardina is a member of the "MOSOQ ALLPA” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Ricardina is 58 years old, separated, and has 4 children.  Her business is buying and selling clothes.  She travels to the city of Lima to buy her merchandise so that she can have a greater variety of products to offer her customers.  Ricardina is a very cheerful person and she has been in her business for some time.

Ricardina is requesting this loan to buy merchandise for her business.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Margarita María

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MOSOQ ALLPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Margarita María; la socia tiene 58 años de edad, viuda y tiene 3 hijos; la socia trababa en una entidad pública de lunes a viernes desde las 08:00am hasta la 01:00pm y de 03:00pm hasta las 07:00pm, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia que es lo más importante que tiene.

La socia solicita el préstamo para su uso personal (no especifico).

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Margarita María is a member of the "MOSOQ ALLPA” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province, in Cusco department.

Margarita María is 58 years old, widowed, and has 3 children.  She works for a public company from Monday to Friday, from 8.00am to 1.00pm and from 3.00pm to 7.00pm.  She is a very cheerful person who has a great desire to get her family ahead in life as they are the most important thing that she has.

Margarita María is requesting this loan for her own (non specific) personal use.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: For her own (non specific) personal use

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Mercedes, La socia tiene 38 años de edad, la socia  es casada y tiene 4 hijos de (22,19,15 y 4), la socia se dedica a la venta de desayunos y almuerzos, ella tiene un pensión familiar en su propia casa, la socia elabora los desayunos y almuerzos y los lleva a las obras donde ella tiene su contrata, la socia tiene de clientes a los obreros, ellos son sus pensionistas, las socia deja los menús respectivos para los pensionistas en las diferentes obras donde la tiene su contrato y le pagan cada 15 días. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a member of the “KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO” community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.

Mercedes is 38 years old, married, and has 4 children aged 22, 19, 15 and 4.  Her business is selling breakfasts and lunches.  She has a small family guesthouse in her own home.  Mercedes prepares her breakfasts and lunches and takes them to the building sites where she has her contracts.  Her customers are the workmen.  She leaves her menus on the different building sites where she has her contracts and her customers pay her every fortnight.  She is requesting this loan to invest in buying supplies.

Mercedes is happy to be receiving this loan and she pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To invest in buying supplies

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy white cotton cloth, ink, powdered soap, caustic soda, and wood to produce more cloths to add to her business.

loans.name: Vajaida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MOSOQ ALLPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Vajaida; la socia tiene 32 años de edad, casada y tiene 1 hijo; la socia se dedica al negocio de compra y venta de ropa, la socia viaja hasta la ciudad de Lima para comprar mercadería y así poder tener más variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes, ella trabaja conjuntamente con su mama hace ya un par de meses atrás, la socia es una persona bien alegre y de esta forma ella saca  a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Vajaida is a member of the "MOSOQ ALLPA” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Vajaida is 32 years old, married, and has 1 child.  Her business is buying and selling clothes.  She travels to the city of Lima to buy her merchandise so that she has a better variety of products to offer her customers.  She has been working together with her mom for a couple of months now.  She is a very cheerful person and this is how she gets her family ahead in life.

Vajaida is requesting this loan to buy merchandise for her business.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: La Sra. Margarita R. O. ella es trabajadora activa de la Empresa “MINED” desempeñándose como Docente tiene veinte   años  de trabajar  como docente de Educacion Primaria es Casada  actualmente, tiene tres hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Margarita R. O. currently works for "MINED" (the Nicaraguan Ministry of Education) as a teacher.  She has been working as an elementary school teacher for twenty years.  Margarita is married and has three school-age children.  She has had two loans from CEPRODEL and used each one to buy building supplies such as sand, cement, stone, gravel, blocks, etc. in order to extend and improve her home.  CEPRODEL's loans have benefited her greatly since she has been able to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy building supplies: sand, cement, stone, gravel, etc.

loans.name: Nelson Jose

texts.es: Desempeñándose como Maestro de Primaria desde el año 1,985  es soltero viaja de león a su centro de trabajo diario, este señor ha obtenido 2 financiamientos con la empresa bajo el convenio firmado con dicho colegio, ya que los financiamientos les han ayudado a mejorar su situación y nivel de vida, ya que la necesidad actual es un tratamiento Médico y Mejoramiento de la vivienda antes que entre el invierno.
texts.en: He has been working as an elementary school teacher since 1985.  He is single and travels from León to his workplace for his daily job.  This gentleman has received 2 loans with the company under the agreement signed with his school.  The loans have helped him to improve his situation and standard of living.  His current need is to have medical treatment and improve his home before the winter comes.

loans.use: to pay for medical expenses (examinations, consultations, medicines) and to improve his home (buying metal sheets, beams, cement and sand)

loans.name: Saida Danitza

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MOSOQ ALLPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Saida Danitza; la socia tiene 54 años de edad; la socia trabaja en una entidad estatal en el área administrativo ella trabaja años en esta entidad del cual ella se siente feliz ya que mediante este trabajo la socia desea realizar el mejoramiento de su casa, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para realizar el mejoramiento de su casa comprando algunos muebles y algunas cosas más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Saida Danitza is a member of the "MOSOQ ALLPA” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Saida Danitza is 54 years old and works in administration for a state institution.  She has been working for her employer for years.  She feels happy because through her work she is able to make improvements to her home.  She is a very cheerful person who has a great desire to get ahead in life.

Saida Danitza is requesting this loan so that she can make some improvements to her home, buying some furniture and a few other things.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To make some improvements to her home, buying some furniture and a few other things

loans.name: We D Woman Dem Group

texts.en:
The members of the “We D Woman Dem” group run small-scale businesses in the city of Makeni in Northern Sierra Leone. With the help of this loan from SMT/Kiva, these entrepreneurs will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales, and earn better profits. Consequently, their living standards will improve: they will be able to provide three meals a day for their children, pay their school fees, buy them clothes, and pay their medical bills.

Emma M. is the leader of this group. For her business, Emma sells beer and soft drinks, which she has been doing for the past five years. Emma will use this loan to buy more drinks at wholesale prices. She is married to a trader and has two children.

loans.use: To purchase drinks at wholesale prices

loans.name: Chick

texts.en:
Chick B. S. E. 48 years old, widowed, and has four children, three of whom are below the age of 15. She lives with her children in Azire New Church Bamenda North West Region of Cameroon.  Chick B. S. E. has faced some challenges in life. She has been struggling to raise her children all by herself since the death of her husband. She faces difficulties providing for their school needs, especially payment of their school fees on time. She plans to invest this loan in a provision store which sells omo, salt, rice, beans, palm oil, nut oils, savon, magi, salt, and firewood. She has been in this business for a long time and  success is her watchword.   Chick B. S. E. will plow her profit back into her business and use part to care for her family. Her children’s school needs will be taken care of. She prefers GHAPE because of the training she frequently receives and the method of obtaining and repaying the loan.

About GHAPE 
The Grounded and Holistic Approach to People's Empowerment (GHAPE) is a non-profit NGO based in Bamenda, Cameroon.  GHAPE works towards the empowerment of the poor and poverty alleviation through a highly multi-faceted approach.  Every client is trained in business management, basic health, life skills, financial management, profits and losses, and family values.  Clients are also required to contribute a small amount into a personal savings account; most clients save much more than the minimum requirement.  GHAPE instills a sense of family and community within its clients and staff and has developed a strong bond of trust between the organization and its clients.

loans.use: To purchase salt, rice, nut oils, savon, omo, and magi

loans.name: Kibong

texts.en:
Kibong I. was born in 1957. She is a widow and mother of six children. She is living with her children in Bali Park, Bamenda, in the north west region of Cameroon.

Kibong I. has faced some challenges in life, including the death of her husband. She faces difficulties in providing for her children's schooling needs, especially in paying their school fees on time. She plans to invest this loan in purchasing drinks such as Coca-Cola, Fanta and Sprite and the selling of roasted fish in front of her bar. 

She has been working in her business for a long time now, and used to work with her husband before his death. Success is her watchword. She believes the business will succeed because of her many years' experience and because her business is at a good location on a junction. She will succeed because she is going to sell her goods at an affordable price.

Kibong I. will plough back her profit into her business and also use part of her profits to care for her family. Her children’s school needs will be taken care of. 

She prefers to work with GHAPE because of the training she frequently receives and the method of obtaining and paying back the loan.

About GHAPE 
The Grounded and Holistic Approach to People's Empowerment (GHAPE) is a non-profit NGO based in Bamenda, Cameroon. GHAPE works towards the empowerment of the poor and poverty alleviation through a highly multi-faceted approach. Every client is trained in business management, basic health, life skills, financial management, profits and losses and family values. Clients are also required to contribute a small amount into a personal savings account; most clients save much more than the minimum requirement. GHAPE instils a sense of family and community within its clients and staff and has developed a strong bond of trust between the organization and its clients.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks and fish to sell.

loans.name: Fullah Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva in Makeni, Northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you the members of the Fullah group. These are small-scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan in order to invest in their businesses. 

Zainab B. is the leader of this group. Zainab is 36 years old and married with four children, one in primary school and three in secondary school. Zainab sells soap, milk, sugar and butter and has been doing this for six years now. With the help of this loan, Zainab will buy more of these goods at wholesale prices to add to her inventory.

loans.use: To buy soap, milk, sugar and butter to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials: sand, cement, stone, gravel, etc. .

loans.name: Manantial Group

texts.es: Doña Julia Maria C. T., es viuda, tiene 40 años D. edad, cursó e tercer año D. educación primaria, tiene 5 hijos D. los cuales 1 esta estudiando, se dedica a la crianza D. animales, tiene ya 15 años D. experiencia con este trabajo, empezó su negocio con deseos D. superación y mejor condición D. vida, y D. esta manera ha podido mantener a su familia. DeciD. organizar un banco con el fin D. que cada una D. las integrantes puedan ampliar su capital D. trabajo, el grupo cuenta con 17 integrantes que se dedican a diversa actividades que son: Venta D. helados, huevo, tienda D. consumo diario, venta D. ropa tipica y crianza D. animales. Desea ver su negocio granD. y con mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Julia Maria C. T. is 40 years old and a widow.  She studied up to the third year of elementary school and has 5 children, one of whom is in school.  

Julia's business is raising animals.  She has 15 years experience in this line of work.  She started her business as she wanted to improve herself and her living conditions.  Through her work, she has been able to support her family.

Julia decided to set up a community bank so that every member could expand their working capital.  This group has 17 members who work in different businesses such as selling iced treats, selling eggs, running a general store, selling traditional clothes and raising animals.  Julia would like to see her business grow and make better profits.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Fet For Shameness Group

texts.en:
Ishiatu K. is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Born 28 years ago in Kenema City, Ishiatu is married and has three children. She sells sugar, sweets, cocoa, milk and other goods in her business. Ishiatu will use the loan to buy more goods at wholesale prices in order to expand her business.

This is the second loan that Ishiatu and her group members have applied for from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To buy sugar, sweets, cocoa, milk and other goods to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, rocks, gravel, etc.

loans.name: Mario Antonio

texts.es: El Sr O.   labora como Higienista es Casado, es el Sextos crédito que CEPRODEL le otorga, agradece el apoyo que  le ha dado esta institución con  este  desembolso para realizar  compra de  materiales de construcción como  cemento, bloque, hierro y útiles escolares, y mano de obra  de su vivienda
texts.en: Mr. O. works as a janitor and he is married. This is the sixth loan that Ceprodel (Kiva Field Partner) has granted him. He is thankful for the support that this organization has provided him through this loan. He has purchased construction materials such as cement, construction blocks, steel, and school supplies, and he has also paid labor costs for the renovations to his house.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Ofelia Del Socorro

texts.es: La Sra. Ofelia del Socorro C. L. ella es trabajadora por cuenta propia se dedica al negocio de venta de Mariscos  ya tiene a sus clientes a quienes le vende el producto ella vende de casa en casa y sus mismos clientes le recomiendan  clientes nuevos  tiene siete años  de dedicarse a esta actividad, es Acompañada actualmente  tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  ocho créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado Para la Compra de Mariscos como pescados, langostas etc  y así   invertirle a su negocio y mejorar la condición del negocio, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Mrs. Ofelia del Socorro C. Lopez works for herself and she has business selling seafood.  She has clients to whom she sells her products and she sells from door to door. Those same clients recommend new clients. She has seven years in the business. She is married and she has one school-aged son. She has had eight past loans through Ceprodel (Kiva Field Partner) and each one has been used to purchase seafood such as fish, lobster, etc. and this is how she invests and improves her business. The loans she has had through Ceprodel have helped her a great deal because this is how she has been improving her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase seafood, such as fish, lobsters, etc.

loans.name: Luz Mery

texts.es:
Luz Mery vive con sus dos hijos y junto con ellos se dedican  a la cría de animales y la venta de los mismo, esta labor que por 15 años ha desempeñado es la que le permitido tener el sustento diario para su familia.


Actualmente ella necesita mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y para esto requiere de la compra de mas animales que sean fáciles de vender y que además pueda tener un buen ingreso con la venta de los mismos.
texts.en:
Luz Mery lives with her two children.  Together they raise and sell animals.  She has done this work for 15 years.  It has allowed her to have daily support for her family.

She currently needs to improve her family’s quality of life.  To do so she needs to buy more easy to sell animals.  She will also have a good income from their sale.

loans.use: To buy animals

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: El Sr M. labora como Higienista es Acompañado, tiene siete persona al su cargo  es el No. 7 del crédito que CEPRODEL le otorga, agradece el apoyo que  le ha dado esta institución con  este  desembolso para realizar  compra de  materiales de construcción como  cemento, bloque, hierro, cinz ,  perlines y mano de obra para hacer poche en su vivienda.
texts.en: Mr. Maleanos works as a janitor and he is married. He is responsible for seven (7) individuals. It is his seventh loan that Ceprodel (Kiva Field Partner) has granted him and he is thankful for the support that given to him by this organization. With this loan he plans on purchasing construction materials such as cement, construction blocks, steel, zinc, beams, and labor costs. He plans on making a porch for his house.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Gustavo Adolfo

texts.es: El Sr. Gustavo Adolfo F. S. el es trabajador activo de la Empresa “Hotel Barceló Monte limar” desempeñándose como Electricista tiene siete   años  de trabajar para esta institución, tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  siete créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Mr. Gustavo Adolfo F. S. is an active employee with the company "Hotel Barcelo Monte Limar". He has been working as an electrician for the past seven years with this company. He has a school-aged son. He has had seven past loans with Ceprodel (Kiva Field Partner) and each one has been used to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, rocks, gravel, construction blocks etc., to expand and improve his house. The loans that Ceprodel has granted him have been a great help because he has been able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, rocks, gravel, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Lila

texts.es: La Sra. Rosa Lila C., es profesora de primaria tiene  quince años de ser maestra, se le han financiado diez crédito los ha utilizado para compra de materiales de construcción como arena, piedra, cemento, piedrín y otros. Para mejorar su vivienda. Todos sus créditos le han beneficiado en gran parte a toda su familia ya que ahora tienen una casita bonita. Que le agradece a ceprodel por todas las oportunidades que se le han brindado y espera que se le siga apoyando.
texts.en: Mrs. Rosa Lila C. is a primary school teacher and she has 15 years as a teacher. She has had ten past loans and she has used them to purchase construction materials such as sand, rocks, cement, gravel and other materials in order to improve her house. All of her loans have helped her family a great deal because she now has a beautiful little home. She is thankful to Ceprodel for all of the opportunities that they have given and she hopes that she will continue to have their support.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, rocks, and gravel

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La sra. María A. C. es profesora de primaria tiene treinta y un año de ser maestra además es costurera en su tiempo libre ella hace sus trabajos de costura, es casada tiene dos hijos los hijos están casado,  se le han financiado once crédito los ha invertido en su negocio en la costura ahora esta solicitando financiamiento para la compra de una lavadora ya que la que tenia se le daño. Se siente agradecida con ceprodel por toda la oportunidades que le hemos dado para ir creciendo y poder tener sus electrodomésticos.
texts.en:
María A. C. has been an elementary school teacher for 31 years.  She is also a seamstress.  During her free time she does work sewing.   She is married and has two children.  The children are married.

She has had 11 loans, which she has used to invest in her seamstress business.  She is now requesting a loan to buy a washer because the one she had broke.  She is grateful to Ceprodel for all of the opportunities that we have given her so that she can continue growing and being able to have her domestic appliances.

loans.use: To buy a washer

loans.name: Coxolitla De Abajo Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama COXOLITL. D. ABAJO. Esta foto fue tomada afuera D. L. casa D. L. señora Gloria A. D. L. S., un integrante del grupo D. coxolitL. D. abajo, que esta ubicado en el estado D. Veracruz en México. L. señora Gloria se dedica aL. venta D. verdura que inicio hace 40 años. solicita el prestamo para incrementar sus ventas y compra más mercancía para su venta. Gracias a L. prestamos sus ventas han hido mejorando por lo que solicita L. renovacion D. su crédito. Al momento D. solicitar este prestamo se siente muy contenta al poder incrementar sus ganacias y así poder ofrecerles una mejor calidad D. vida a sus hijos y logren tener una carrera profesional, y no se sienta presionada con L. gastos D. su familia. ElL. tiene 49 años estudió hasta L. primaria, es madre y tiene 8 hijos; 3 mujeres y 5 varones. Desea este credito para incrementar su negocio. Tambien espera continuar con el credito y poner su propio local en el mercado D. su localidad.
texts.en:
The group is called CoxolitL. D. Abajo.  This photo was taken outsiD. of Gloria A. D. L. S.’ house.  She is a member of the CoxolitL. D. Abajo group.  The group is located in the state of Veracruz in Mexico.

Gloria has a business selling vegetables, which she started 40 years ago.  She is requesting the loan to increase her sales and to buy more merchandise to sell.  Thanks to the loans her sales have been improving.  That is why she is requesting a renewal of her loan.  At the time of requesting this loan she feels very pleased to be able to increase her earnings and not feel pressured about the family expenses.  She is also pleased to offer a better quality of life to her children so that they can manage to become professionals.

She is 49 years old, and she has an elementary school education.  She has eight children, three girls and five boys.  She wants the loan to expand her business.  She also hopes to move ahead with the loan and be able to set up her own spot at the market in her area.

loans.use: To invest in her vegetable business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, rocks, gravel, and zinc

loans.name: Ilario

texts.es: El Sr. Ilario  tiene como actividad la carpintería, el  realiza todo tipo de trabajo que le piden sus clientes como ser roperos juego de dormitorio y otros,  actualmente se encuentra realizando muebles de cocina y puertas, el Sr. Ilario es una persona muy responsable su familia esta compuesta por su esposa  y sus seis hijos tres de ellos son universitarios su esposa también le ayuda en el mantenimiento de su hogar, trabajando junto a el , esta ocasión solicita crédito para la compra de madera para tener un stock de materia prima para enfrentar contratos futuros, tiene el deseo de poder tener un carpintería grande donde pueda brindar trabajo a jóvenes que se están iniciando en este campo, es un apersona muy trabajadora y responsable, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Ilario is a carpenter.  He does all types of work that his customers request.  He makes things like wardrobes, bedroom sets, and others.  He is currently making kitchen furniture and doors.

Ilario is a very responsible person.  His family is comprised of his wife and their six children.  Three of the children are university students.  His wife also helps support the household by working with him.

He is requesting a loan this time to buy wood in order to have raw material in stock to handle future contracts.  He wishes to be able to have a large carpentry shop where he would be able to offer work to young people who are starting out in this field.  He is a very hard-working and responsible person.  He is grateful to the institution for the support they have provided.

loans.use: To buy raw material, wood

loans.name: Álvaro Antonio

texts.es: El Sr R. labora como Higienista es Casado, tiene tres persona al su cargo  es el No. 6 del crédito que CEPRODEL le otorga, agradece el apoyo que  le ha dado esta institución con  este  desembolso para ,compra de  materiales de construcción como  cemento, bloque, hierro, cinz ,  perlines y mano de obra para hacer anexo de un cuarto en su vivienda.ya que la familia  va creciendo.
texts.en: Mr. R. works as a janitor and he is married. He has three individuals in his care. This is his sixth loan that Ceprodel (Kiva Field Partner) has granted him and he is thankful for the support that this organization has given him. With this loan he will purchase construction materials such as cement, construction blocks, steel, zinc, beams and to pay labor costs to add another room to his house, especially important because his family is growing.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Rosas De Ojo Zarco Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en la casa de la señora Cristina A. L. una integrante del grupo "ROSA DE OJO ZARCO" que esta ubicado en la cuidad de nogales en el estado de VeraC. en México. La señora Cristina se dedica a la venta de producto de belleza que inicio hace mas de 4 años. Solicita este prestamo para invertir más mercancía, cumplir con los pedidos que le hacen y mejorara sus ingresos. Al momento de solictar este prestamo se siente feliz porque asi podra tener una estabilidad en su economia. tiene 34 años estudió hasta la universidad, es madre tiene dos hijos; un varon y una mujer. Desea este crédito para ofrecerles una mejor vida a su familia. También espera poner un local donde tenga más productos de belleza. Mayra O. es la tesorera del grupo tiene 29 años, estudió hasta la preparatoria y es madre, ella se dedica a la venta de calzado por catalogo que inició hace 3 años, solicoita este prestamo para incrementar en sus ventas y poder satisfacer los pedidos de sus clientes, obteniendo así una estabilidad economica y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This photo was taken at the house of Señora Cristina A. L., a member of the "ROSA DE OJO ZARCO" group, which is located in the city of Nogales in the state of VeraC. in Mexico. 

Señora Cristina sells beauty products, a business that she started over four years ago.  She is requesting this loan in order purchase more stock and fulfill her orders, so that she can increase her income. She feels happy asking for this loan because it will provide her with economic stability. Señora Cristina is 34 years old and she is educated to university level. She is a mother of two children, a boy and a girl. She wants this loan in order to provide a better life for her family. She also hopes to set up a store where she can have more beauty products. 

Mayra O. is the group treasurer. She is a 29-year-old mother who studied through high school. She sells footwear through a catalog, a business that she started three years ago. She is requesting this loan in order to boost her sales and fulfill customer orders, thus gaining economic stability and a better quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase stock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, rocks, gravel, and construction blocks

loans.name: Luisa Idalia

texts.es: Este cliente es originario de León, Actualmente esta laborando en el Colegio Sara María Parrales de San Jacinto, Desempeñándose como Maestro de Primaria desde el año 2001  es soltera viaja de león a su centro de trabajo diario, esta señora ha obtenido 2 financiamientos con la empresa bajo el convenio firmado con dicho colegio, ya que los financiamientos les han ayudado a mejorar su situación y nivel de vida, ya que la necesidad actual es el Mejoramiento de la vivienda antes que entre el invierno.
texts.en: She is originally from Leon. She is currently employed at the Sara Maria Parrales de San Jacinto school, working as a primary school teacher since the year 2001. She is single and she travels from Leon to her place of work every day. She has had two past loans with the organization granted through her school. Her loans have helped her improve her situation and the quality of her life. Her current need is to improve her house before the arrival winter.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as cement, sand, zinc, beams, and to cover labor costs

loans.name: Editha Ysabel

texts.es: La Sra. Editha vive en la zona del plan 3000. Ella se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace 2 años, su esposo trabaja en San Aurelio como ayudante de fábrica, tienen un hijo de 2 años. La Sra. Editha estaba en el banco de emprendimiento  27 de mayo, donde demostró un buen comportamiento de pago. El crédito que están solicitando es para la compra de material de construcción para ampliar su pensión ya que ella vive en la casa de sus suegros y están construyendo 3 tiendas donde abrirá su pensión y ahí podrá brindar mejor atención a los clientes,  va a comprar mesas, sillas, un horno, La Sra. Editha  es trabajadora, al igual que su esposo y se han propuesto trabajar duro para darle un futuro a su hijo.
texts.en:
Sra Editha lives in the Plan 3000 area of Santa Cruz in Bolivia. She has earned her living selling food for the last two years. Her husband works in a factory in San Aurelio. They have a 2-year old son. 

Editha became a member of the community bank on May 27th and did well with her loan repayments. She is now seeking a loan to buy construction materials to expand her boarding house as she lives with her in-laws. They are building three stores in the area where Editha will have her boarding house. She plans to buy tables, chairs, and a stove so as to provide her customers with improved conditions. 

Both Editha and her husband are hardworking people, and they plan to work hard to provide their son with a good future.

loans.use: purchase of construction material

loans.name: María Elisa

texts.es: La Sra. María M. es trabajadora activa  del colegio los Gutiérrez norte es maestra de primaria tiene seis años de labora para esta institución está acompañada con su pareja, tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  tres créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, zinc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ha  mejorado su condición de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Mrs. Maria Martinez is an active employee of the school Gutierrez Norte and she has been working as a primary school teacher for the past six years. She is married and she has two school-aged children. She has had three past loans with Ceprodel (Kiva Field Partner) and each one has been used to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, rocks, gravel, zinc, with the goal of expanding and improving her house. The loans granted through Ceprodel have been a great help because she has been able to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase sand, rocks, gravel, and zinc.

loans.name: Maximiliano

texts.es:
Maximiliano de 52 años, es un hombre trabajador que por 11 años ha trabajado en una empresa como Operativo. 

Dando esfuerzo a todo su día de trabajo desde las 08h00am hasta las 19h00pm. Tienes muchas aspiraciones para seguir con su trabaja ya que tiene tres hijos y uno de ellos es niño especial. Para darle una mejor vida a sus hijos y esposa él quiere comprar con el préstamo cemento, bloques, zinc para construir mejor su casa. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
52-year old Maximiliano is a hardworking man who for the last eleven years has worked as an operator in a business. His long day starts at 8am and finishes at 7pm. He has a great desire to continue in his work as he has three children, one of them a special needs child, to support.  

To provide them and his wife with a better life, he wishes to use the loan to buy cement, blocks, and zinc sheeting to make improvements to his house. Maximiliano’s wish for the future is to finish building his house.

loans.use: purchase of cement, blocks, and zinc sheeting

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es: La Sra. C. Gutierrez es maestra de secundaria tiene cuatro años de trabajar para esta institución, es soltera, no tiene hijos, se le han financiado tres créditos y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando para compra de medicamento, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  solucionado problemas familiares y también ha mejorado su condición de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Mrs. C. Gutierrez is a secondary school teacher and she has four years working with the institution. She is single and she does not have children. She has had three past loans and each one has been used to purchase construction materials to expand and improve her house. The loan she requests now will be used to purchase medicines. The loans granted to her by Ceprodel are a great help because she has been able to overcome family difficulties and she has also improve her living conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: to rocks and construction blocks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sand, rocks, and cement

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, rocks, and gravel

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase rocks, sand, cement, and zinc

loans.name: Leyla Vicenta

texts.es: Este Cliente es originario de telica, casada con 2 hijos que estudian en el colegio de la misma localidad, ella labora en el instituto señor de Esquipulas de la misma localidad, desempeñándose como Maestro de Secundaria con 22 años de Laborar en esa Area, siendo cliente de la empresa desde el año 2003 siendo fiel y actualmente tiene financiamiento activo, los cuales les han venido ayudar a mejorar su condición y Nivel de vida, ya que la necesidad actual es el mejoramiento del techo de su vivienda ya que se aproxima la temporada de invierno y quiere tenerlo listo antes de esa fecha.
texts.en: She is originally from Telica, she is married, and she has 2 children who go to school in their neighborhood. She works in the Senor de Esquipulas institution which is located in their neighborhood, working as a secondary school teacher. She has 22 years in this field of work. Having been a loyal client of this organization since 2003 she currently has an active loan. The loans have been a create help in improving her living conditions and her quality of life. Her current need is to improve the roof of her house especially because winter is approaching and she wants to have it ready before that time.

loans.use: to purchase zinc, beams, steeel, cement, construction blocks and paint

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Manuela Del Socorro

texts.es: Manuela Del Socorro tiene su negocio que es un bar y comedor. Hace más 31 años que tiene este medio de vida. Es una mujer luchadora que cada día atraviesa por diferentes problemas. El motivo de este financiamiento es para la compra de granos básicos, platos, leña, jugos, gaseosas, bolsas, entre otros productos necesarios. Pues todos los días trabaja para ofrecer a sus clientes buen servicio, buena calidad en sus platillos entre otras cosas.
texts.en:
Manuela del Socorro runs a bar and cafe. She’s earned her living this way for the past 31 years. She is a hardworking woman who is faced with different problems on a daily basis. 

The purpose of this loan is to buy grains, plates, firewood, juice, soft drinks, bags and other needed items. Manuela works hard every day to provide her customers with good service and quality food etc.

loans.use: purchase of items for her cafe

loans.name: José Manuel

texts.es: El Sr. José Manuel G. B. él es trabajador activo de la Empresa “Alcaldía Municipal de San Rafael del Sur” desempeñándose como Guarda de Seguridad tiene seis   años  de trabajar para esta institución  es casado actualmente, tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  siete créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Mr. Jose Manuel Garcia B. is an active employee of the municipal city hall of San Rafael del Sur, working as a security guard. He has six years working for this organization. He is married and he has two school-aged children. He has had seven past loans with Ceprodel (Kiva Field Partner) and each one has bee used to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, rocks, gravel, construction blocks etc., in order to expand and improve his house. The loans granted to him by Ceprodel have been a great help because he has been able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, and rocks

loans.name: Felipa Anastacia

texts.es:
La Sra. Felipa Anastasia B., es madre de cuatro   hijos de los cuales ninguno está a su cargo actualmente se dedica a la venta de refresco, agua, gaseosas, prepara los refresco en su casa de habitación y posteriormente  realiza su comercialización ambulante  en las calle de la Ciudad de  león, cabe mencionar que lleva 30 años dedicados a esta labor, lo que ha venido ayudarle a mejorar las condiciones de vida de ella y su familia.
Con los créditos que Ceprodel  le ha brindado ella compra por mayor el producto tale como: leña, papas, cacao, azúcar, payana, cebada en grano, gaseosas, gatorade, bolsas plástica para la elaboración de refrescos y papitas frita  y así obtiene mayor ganancia, lo que le ha ayudado a realizar mejora a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Mrs. Felipa Anastasia B. is a mother of four children although none of them are currently in her care. She sells fresh fruit juices, water, and soft drinks.  She prepares the juices in her house and she later sells them itinerantly along the streets of the city of Leon. It should be mentioned that she has 30 years in this business. She has been able to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

With the loans granted to her by Ceprodel (Kiva Field Partner) she has been able to purchase products in wholesale, including: firewood, potatoes, cocoa, sugar, payan, barley grains, soft drinks, Gatorade brand drinks, and plastic bags. These products are used to make drinks and French fries in order to increase her earnings. This has helped her carry out improvements to her house.

loans.use: to purchase firewood, potatoes, cocoa, sugar, payan, barley grains, soft drinks, and plastic bags

loans.name: Dalia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HACIA EL TRIUNFO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Dalia, La socia tiene 35 años de edad, la socia  es casada y tiene 3 hijos (todos menores de edad), la socia es docente de profesión y ella se dedica a supervisar y a las labores administrativas, la socia desea en esta oportunidad el crédito para comprar útiles escolares, ella aprovechará la temporada de campaña escolar para comprar al por mayor útiles para que más adelante no le salga caro. La socia  solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de útiles escolares en campaña escolar.
.
La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Dalia belongs to the “Hacia el Triunfo” (Towards the Triumph) Communal Bank, located in Huanchac district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Dalia is 35 years old, married, and has 3 children (all minors).  She is a teacher by profession and currently dedicated to supervision as an administrator.  Dalia  desires this loan to buy school supplies during this season while prices are cheaper.

She is happy about the authorization of the loan and promises to comply with her repayments as scheduled.

loans.use: BUYING SCHOOL SUPPLIES WHILE PRICES ARE LOW

loans.name: Reynaldo Jose

texts.es: El señor G. labora como maestro de obar de construccion  es  casado,  tiene un hijos a su cargo, es el primer  del crédito que CEPRODEL le otorga, agradece el apoyo que le brindan con  este  desembolso, para realizarse compra de materiales de construcción como arena, cemento, hierro, y pago de mano de obra para mejora de su vivienda en ampliar cuartos.
texts.en: Mr. G. works as a construction laborer. He is married and is raising children. This is his first loan with CEPRODEL. He is grateful for the support offered by it. With it, he will buy construction materials such as sand, cement, and iron, as well as to pay for labor to do some home improvement by enlarging some rooms.

loans.use: to do home improvement.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es: La Sra. María Elena C. L. ella es trabajadora activa de la Empresa “Hotel Barceló Monte limar” desempeñándose como Camarera tiene cinco   años  de trabajar para esta institución  actualmente tiene cuatro hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: María Elena C. L. currently works for the company “Hotel Barceló Monte limar” as a waitress.  She has been working for this company for five years.  María has four school-age children.  She has had two loans from CEPRODEL and both of them were used to buy building supplies such as sand, cement, stone, gravel, blocks, etc. in order to extend and improve her home.
