CEPRODEL's loans have greatly benefited María since she has improved her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy building supplies: sand, cement and stone

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase implements to offer improved  cosmetology and cosmiatry services.

loans.name: Martha Irene

texts.es: Este cliente es originario de la comarca el tololar, actualmente se desempeña como maestra de primaria en el colegio Concepción de María de la comarca la Mora, es soltera sin hijos, convive con su mama, esta señora tiene 23 años de desempeñar dicha labor, ya que desde el año 2003 tiene financiamientos hasta la fecha, obteniendo mejores condiciones y nivel de vida, ya que la necesidad  inmediata es de embaldosar el piso para evitar la subida de humedad en tiempo de invierno para evitar problemas de salud principalmente por la mama quien es una señora de edad avanzada.
texts.en: This client is from Tololar district.  She currently works as an elementary school teacher in Concepción de María school, in Mora district.  She is single, doesn't have any children, and lives with her mom.  This lady has been working as a teacher for 23 years.  From 2003 to the present day she has had loans from CEPRODEL which have improved her living conditions and standard of living.  Her immediate need is to tile her floor to avoid the damp rising during the winter.  This will help avoid health problems, particularly for her mom who is an elderly lady.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel, and to pay for transportation and labor

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HACIA EL TRIUNFO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Angelica, La socia tiene 42 años de edad, la socia  es casada y tiene 1 hijo de 15 años de edad, la socia trabaja como promotora de una institución pública, la socia también elabora todo tipo de mermeladas y manjares y los vende a sus compañeros en su institución según sea el pedido que le hagan. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de mermeladas y manjares.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This lady is a member of the “HACIA EL TRIUNFO” Banco Comunal, which is located in the district of Huanchac, which belongs to the province and department of Cusco.

She is called Señora Angelica and she is 42 years old, married, with one child who is 15 years old. She works as a marketer in a public institution. She also makes all kinds of delicacies and jams, which she sells to order to her co-workers at the institution. Señora Angelica is requesting a loan to purchase ingredients for making the jams and delicacies.

She is happy to be receiving this loan and committed to making her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make jams and other delicacies

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HACIA EL TRIUNFO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Josefina, La socia tiene 44 años de edad, la socia  es soltera y tiene 2 hijos, la socia se dedica a la compostura, ella tiene un taller de costurera en su casa y hace compostura de trajes, mandiles, manteles, enaguas, y todo tipo de trajes para fiestas. La socia desea el crédito para comprar telas, encajes, cintas, hilos, agujas y otros para implementar su taller.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Hacia el Triunfo (Toward Triumph) Community Bank. This bank is located in the Huanchac district, province and department of Cusco.

The member is Josefina. She is 44 years old. She is single and has two children. The member is a seamstress; she has a dressshop in her home and sews suits, aprons, blankets, skirts, and all sorts of party outfits. She is requesting this loan to purchase fabric, lace, buttons, thread, needles, and other items for her sewing.

The member is happy with this authorize loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase fabric, lace, buttons, thread, needles, etc. for her tailor shop.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es: Marcelina, de 59 años, vive en su casa propia al lado de sus tres hijas que son mayores y le ayudan en su labor diaria; juntas se esfuerzan a diario para salir adelante. Desde hace 17 años, esta trabajadora dama se dedica a la venta de golosinas y piqueos en un kiosco que esta ubicado dentro de un colegio de su zona. Esta muy satisfecha pues con este negocio obtiene regulares ganancias que le han permitido sacar adelante a su familia; además le gusta atender a los niños y jóvenes que le suelen comprar en el kiosco, pero a veces no le alcanza tiempo por lo que sus hijas mayores la ayudan. Paralelamente a esta actividad también se dedica a la venta de menú (platillos diarios) que ofrece a sus comensales fijos, que en su mayoría son obreros de construcción que le pagan semanalmente. Para el futuro tiene planeado instalar un restaurante en su casa, pues quiere empezar con un negocio tranquilo y fijo para mejorar sus ganancias. Es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Marcelina tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de mercadería para surtir su negocio; además quiere pagar la garantía que le permitirá empezar a trabajar en el kiosco del colegio.
texts.en:
Marcelina, 59, lives in her own house next to her three adult daughters who help her with daily work.  Together, they strive every day to get ahead.  For 17 years, this hardworking lady has been selling candy and snacks at a kiosk located inside a school in her area.  She is very pleased with this business for giving her regular income that has allowed her to raise her family.  She also likes to serve the children and teenagers who tend to patronize the kiosk, but sometimes she doesn't have enough time, so her daughters help out.  

Alongside this business, Marcelina also sells daily dishes that she offers to a set of regular customers, most of whom are construction workers who pay weekly.  Her future plans are to install a restaurant in her house because she wants to start a casual and permanent business to improve her profits.  

This is her first loan with MFP and she promises to pay her dues, not wanting to give a bad impression to people who have made contributions and allowed her to continue working to progress.  Marcelina has planned to invest the requested loan in buying merchandise for her business.  She also wants to pay the deposit that will let her start working in the school kiosk.

loans.use: To buy products for her kiosk.

loans.name: Mayra Del Socorro

texts.es:
Mayra es una pequeña comerciante, que como objetivo ha sido la construcción de su casa, ha trabajado en diferentes labores para lograr ingresos y apoyar a su familia. Tiene dos hijos y su esposo labora como albañil.
Hoy en día tiene su propio negocio de venta de carne de res y cerdo, iniciando con pocas ventas, logrando la clientela por tener precios accesibles y de buena calidad.
Hoy con este nuevo préstamo, será para seguir cerrando su casa, con el crédito anterior logro cerrar parte del techo pero no termino, faltándole material con lo que con este nuevo financiamiento que Afodenic está otorgando podrá cerrar completamente el techo. En donde comprara, láminas de zinc, golosos, puertas, ventana, siendo su noveno octavo crédito en donde se ha beneficiado obteniendo un mejor techo.
texts.en:
Mayra is a small trader whose main goal has been the construction of her home. She has worked in different things to generate more income and support her family. She has two sons and her husband is a builder. She owns a meat-selling business (beef and pork), which she started with a few sales and now has a regular customer base thanks to its affordable prices and good quality. 

With this new loan she will continue with the roofing of her house. With the previous loan she managed to do it partially but wasn't able to finish it beause she lacked material. This new loan that Afodenic is providing her with will enable her to completely finish the roofing. She will buy sheets of zinc, screws, doors and a window. This will be her eighth loan and she will benefit from it as her house will have a much better roof.

loans.use: to buy sheets of zinc, screws, doors and a window in order to finish covering the roof.

loans.name: Mujeres De Maíz Group

texts.es: Doña Reina V. V. D. G., es casada, tiene 45 años D. edad, tiene ocho hijos seis D. los cuales estan estudiando, ella se dedica a la artesanía, confección D. pants y playeras, su conyugue es comerciante, tienen ya dieciseis años con el trabajo que realizan, iniciaron con un capital pequeño que prestaron. Doña Reina decidió organizar un grupo con el fin D. solicitar un préstamo y asi poder ampliar su capital D. trabajo, ya que cada una D. las integrantes se dedican a diversas actividades productivas como: confección D. pants, sudaderos, playeras, camisas, venta D. blusas, Baldes, cubetas y la crianza D. animales. Esperan ver mejor su negocio com mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Reina V. V. D. G. is 45 years old and married.  She has eight children, and six of them are in school.  She devotes herself to working with her hands.  She makes pants and t-shirts.  Her husband is a merchant.  They have been doing this work for 16 years.  They started with a small amount of borrowed money.

Reina decided to organize a group in order to request a loan.  That way they would be able to increase their working capital.  Each one of the members devotes themselves to different productive activities like making pants, sweatshirts, t-shirts, shirts, selling blouses, buckets, trays, and raising animals.  They hope to see their businesses improve with better earnings.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: El sr P. labora como ALBAÑIL es  casado,  tiene TRES hijos a su cargo, es el primer  del crédito que CEPRODEL le otorga, agradece el apoyo que le brindan con  este  desembolso, para realizarse compra de materiales de construcción como arena, cemento, hierro y pago de mano de obra para mejora de su vivienda PARA CONSTRUIR PARDE DE SU CASA.
texts.en: Mr P. works as a builder. He is married and has three children to support. This is his first loan with CEPRODEL. He is grateful with the support received, as the money will enable him to buy building materials such as sand, cement, iron and labour to build part of his house and improve his home.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as sand, cement, iron and labour in order to improve his home.

loans.name: Marvin Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. Marvin Antonio G. P. él es trabajador activo de la Empresa CEMEX desempeñándose como Obrero  tiene siete    años  de trabajar para esta institución  es casado actualmente, tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y uno lo realizo para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando para la compra de dos cabeza de Ganados (vaquilla), los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Marvin Antonio G. P. works for the company CEMEX as a laborer.  He has been working for the company for seven years.  Marvin is married and has two school-age children.  He has had two loans from CEPRODEL and used one of them to buy building supplies such as sand, cement, stone, gravel, blocks etc. to extend and improve his home.  He is requesting this current loan to buy two head of cattle (heifers).  CEPRODEL's loans have greatly benefited him as they have helped him to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy two heifers

loans.name: Mario Jesus

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HACIA EL TRIUNFO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Mario Jesus, El socio tiene 57 años de edad, el socio  es casado y tiene 2 hijos, el socio es músico de profesión, el socio tiene una agrupación musical llamada Aroma, él y su grupo se presentan para amenizar todo tipo de compromisos y tocan, cantan todo tipo de canciones como el ritmo de salsa, huaynos, criollas, boleros, vals, tangos, baladas, pop, rock; el socio pertenece al banco comunal desde hace 7 años atrás y el compra instrumentos musicales este es su pasión y siempre que puede compra uno nuevo, el ahora desea poner una tienda de venta de instrumentos, para lo cual necesita comprar algunos instrumentos más. él esta viendo entre más guitarras y castañuelas. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar un instrumento musical.

El socio está feliz con el préstamo  que le otorgaran y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank named "Until the Triumph"; this bank is located in the district of Huanchac, Province of Cusco, Department of Cusco. 

The member is Sr. Mario Jesus. He is 57 years old, married, and has two children. He is a musician by profession and has a band called "Aroma". He and his group show up to liven up every kind of committment party, and they play and sing all sort of songs, such as salsa, huayanos, native songs, boleros, vals, tango, ballads, pop, and rock. He has belonged to the communal bank for seven years and buys new musical instruments since this is his passion and would always like to be able to purchase a new one. Now he would like to open a musical instrument store, for which he needs to buy some more instruments; he's looking to buy more castanets and guitars. He is asking for the loan to purchase a musical instrument.

The member is happy with the loan that he has been granted and commits to complying with the payment of his cuotas in the established term.

loans.use: El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar un instrumento musical.

loans.name: Hilda Alicia

texts.es: La Sra. Hilda y su familia viven en una colonia donD. las casas se encuentran pegadas una a otra, y aunque son independientes, la barda D. los patios traseros son D. una altura muy pequeña, es por esta razón que la Sra. Hilda y su esposo adquirieron un crédito con esta institución así ellos podrán terminar  el levantamiento D. la barda D. bloque que esta en el patio, ya que ellos no tienen la suficiente privacidad, como cuando tienden la  ropa, el vecino la ve  y ellos desean tener  su propio espacio, así como tambien D. este modo al levantar la barda  lo mas alto posible ellos evitaran que los ladrones puedan brincar a su patio para robarles  y así mismo obtendrán mayor seguridad.
texts.en: Sra. Hilda and her family live in a neighborhood where the houses are virtually on top of one another.  The wall at the back of her house is very low and her neighbors can easily see over it, so she and her husband are applying for a loan from this institution to build a higher, more secure wall.  They're concerned about privacy--when they hang their washing out, for example, all the neighbors know--and they want to carve out a space that's wholly their own.  They're also concerned about security and a higher wall will make it more difficult for thieves to break in to their house.

loans.use: Build a security wall.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HACIA EL TRIUNFO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Elsa, La socia tiene 41 años de edad, la socia  es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos, la socia se dedica a trabajar en una academia de preparación para la universidad, ella trabaja por horas haciendo la limpieza del lugar y ella también tiene un local pequeño aquí en la academia y prepara comidas rápidas para los mismos alumnos, ella desea el préstamo para comprar los insumos e implementar su pequeño negocio, la socia desea poder crecer con su negocio y ahorrar todo el capital que ingrese de este para abrir un local grande y dedicarse solo a la elaboración de alimentos para la venta. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de hamburguesas y otros.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Elsa, 41, belongs to the Hacia El Triunfo ("Toward Victory") community bank.  The bank is in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.

Sra. Elsa is partnered and has 3 children.  She works as a cleaner at an academy that trains students for university study.  She spends part of her day cleaning the academy building and another part running a small restaurant that she started there to sell prepared foods to the academy's students.  She is applying for a loan so that she can buy supplies for the business.  She wants to grow the business and save the profits so that she can open a larger space where she can run her own restaurant full time.  Sra. Elsa will use the loan to buy supplies for making hamburgers and other prepared foods.

Sra. Elsa is grateful for your help and is committed to repaying this loan in the agreed-upon time.

loans.use: Buy supplies for restaurant business.

loans.name: Norely

texts.es: Norely  es una joven de 27 años, ella vive en el barrio San Agustín, pues siempre ha sido trabajadora. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche, a pesar de tener ciertas dificultades en su trabajo Norely mantiene su ánimo para sonreír y ofrecer un buen servicio a sus clientes. Ya son tres años que ella se dedica a la venta de colchones esta actividad y le ha permitido ganarse la vida honradamente, está muy agradecida. El financiamiento es solicitado es para la compra de una gran variedad de colchones.
texts.en: Norely, 27, lives in the San Agustin neighborhood.  She has always worked hard.  She starts work at 6 in the morning, every day, and works until 7 in the evening.  She sometimes has problems with the business, but she's managed to stay enthusiastic, always smiling and working hard to provide her customers with the very best service.  She has been selling mattresses for three years now and is pleased that the business provides her with a decent income.  She is applying for a loan so that she can buy more mattresses.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Juana Gladys

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HACIA EL TRIUNFO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Juana, La socia tiene 52 años de edad, la socia  es casada y tiene 2 hijos, la socia se dedica a la enfermería, ella es enfermera de profesión en el hospital Antonio Lorena, la socia es una mujer muy dedicada y responsable y alterna su trabajo y en su tiempo libre ella vende ropa, la socia realiza esta otra actividad para poder incrementar su economía y de este modo dar mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. La socia desea el préstamo para poder invertir en la compra de ropa.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Juana, 52, is a member of the Hacia El Triunfo ("On To Victory") community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.

Sra. Juana is married and has 2 children.  She works as a nurse at the Antonio Lorena hospital.  She is a hard-working, responsible woman and she supplements her nursing income with a clothing sales business.  She set up the business to increase her income so that she could provide a better standard of living for herself and her children.  She will use the loan to buy merchandise for her clothing business.

Sra. Juana is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it in the agreed-upon time.

loans.use: Buy merchandise for clothing business.

loans.name: Jorge Armando

texts.es: El Sr. Jorge Armando, tiene una vivienda L. cual esta  remodelando ya que  se  encuentra  un poco deteriorada tanto  del  interior  como exterior D. L. casa, el se preocupa por L. buena imagen y como tiene muchas visitas  D. sus  familiares  y amigos  el desea brindarles  una buena impresión. Actualmente le ha estado  realizando mejoras a L. vivienda sobre todo por L. inseguridad  y piensa que al poner protecciones a L. vivienda, el  se sentirá mas protegido  y cuando se  encuentre  trabajando  estará mas tranquilo.
texts.en: Sr. Jorge Armando is remodeling his house because it is seriously in need of repairs, both insiD. and out.  He cares how the house looks because he often has friends and family to stay and he wants the house to make a good impression.  He is especially concerned about security and the improvements he's planning incluD. measures to make it more secure.  He says that when the house is better protected, he'll feel more easy when he's away at work.

loans.use: Security for house.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOQ ALLPA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Sonia, La socia tiene 46 años de edad, la socia  es separada y tiene 1 hijo, la socia trabaja con este banco desde sus inicios, ella es una de las socias fundadoras y la socia administra un snack café situado en la florida, el negocio de la socia se llama “Gustitos al paso”, La socia es una mujer muy alegre y muy trabajadora, ella desea dar a sus hijo lo mejor y sobre todo una carrera profesional, la socia desea el crédito para implementar su negocio y también está pensando en poner una heladería en el mismo local, para lo cual ella requiere el préstamo. La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar su negocio y tener la venta de helados.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Mosoq Allpa communal bank which is located in the Huanchac district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is Sonia, 46, and is separated with 1 son.  The member has worked with this bank since its beginning.  She is one of the founders and Sonia runs a snack café located in La Florida, called Gustitos al Paso.  She is a cheerful and hardworking woman who wants the best for her son, especially a professional career.  Sonia is requesting the loan to set up her business and she is also thinking about selling ice cream in the same stand.  For this she needs the loan, and the money will be used to set up her business and to also sell ice cream.

Sonia is happy with the loan issued her and she promises to make her payments in the established time period.

loans.use: The member is requesting a loan to set up her business and to sell ice cream

loans.name: Mujeres De La Cumbre Group

texts.es: Doña Olga Marina L. S., es casada, tiene veintinueve años D. edad, cursó el sexto año D. educación primaria, tiene 3 hijos D. las cuales 1 esta estudiando, se dedica a la cofección D. blusas, el esposo D. ella es herrero, tiene diez años D. experiencia, cuenta con la ayuda D. su esposo. Doña Olga deciD. organizar un grupo para poder solictar un préstamo que les servira para comprar mas materia prima como: tela, hilo; las integrantes se dedican diversas actividades como: confeccion y venta D. blusas,helados tienda D. consumo, y crianza D. animales, quiere ver su negocio granD. y con variedad D. diseños y estilos D. blusas.
texts.en:
Doña Olga Marina L. S. is married and is 29 years old. She completed six years of primary education. She has three children, one of which is in school. She works to sew blouses and her husband is a blacksmith. She has ten years of experience and has her husband's support. 

Doña Olga decided to organize a group to ask for a loan that would allow each of them them to expand their access to working capital. The members of the group are dedicated to various activities such as making and selling blouses, ice cream, a retail store, and animal care. She wants to see her business grow larger and with a variety of designs and styles of blouses.

loans.use: Purchase of raw materials

loans.name: Angela Del Carmen

texts.es:
Ángela es madre de  tres hijos, comerciante de ropa nueva y segunda mano, iniciando hace varios años con apoyo de su esposo quien labora como docente.
Atreves de los préstamos en Afodenic, ha logrado las mejoras de su vivienda pues son ocho ciclos de los cuales se ha beneficiado para obtener un techo digno para su familia.
Lo que quiere es poner cerámica en sala, ya que por medio de estos financiamientos le ha sido posible. Lo que comprara: cerámica, cemento bond, para comenzar la obra.
texts.en:
Ángela is the mother of three children and sells new and second hand clothing. She began her business a few years ago with the help of her husband, who is a teacher. 

Through loans from Afodenic, she has managed to improve her home. With eight loans, she has been able to obtain a good roof for her family. She now wants to put stoneware in a room in her house, and this method of financing has made that possible. She will buy tiles and cement to begin the work.

loans.use: Purchase of stoneware and cement to put in her home

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosario; la socia tiene 63 años de edad, casada y tiene 6 hijos; la socia se dedica a la venta de golosinas como galletas, dulces, chicles, gaseosas entre otros, la socia lleva ya un buen tiempo en este negocio su carreta de dulces se encuentra ubicado en el paradero de los carros que salen al distrito de  Sicuani, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más mercadería para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rosario, 63, is a member of the “PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN” communal bank located in Cusco district which belongs to Cusco province, Cusco department.

She’s married and has six children.  She sells snacks like: cookies, candy, chewing gum and soft drinks, among other.  She has been in business for some time now and her candy cart is located at the bus stop for cars going to Sicuani district.  She is quite a cheerful person with much drive to get ahead.

She is asking for the loan to buy more merchandise for her business.  She is happy about the loan can commits to pay her installments.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Artesanas De Xecojom Group

texts.en:
Juliana is 40 years old, married, and has seven children. Six of her children are currently in school. Juliana works in clothing sales as well as in animal raising. Her husband helps support her family with his work as a merchant. She has been working in clothing sales for over 5 years.

Juliana is requesting a loan as part of the Artesanas D. Xecojom Group (The Artisans of Xecojom) to purchase more clothing to sell in the market. She started her business selling socks and other small clothing items. She hopes to expand her business with the help of this loan and increase her sales. 

The other members of the Artesanas D. Xecojom Group are involved in the following businesses: basket weaving, animal raising, clothing sales, fruit stands, and everyday consumer goods sales.

loans.use: To purchase clothing for sale

loans.name: San Juana

texts.es: La Sra. San Juanita, es una señora que le gusta mucho estar siempre al tanto de su casa, ella a avanzando cada vez mas en el mejoramiento de su vivienda, y ahora su deseo es  instalar protecciones a su domicilio, ya que ahí vive con su hija y una nieta, su miedo es que cuando ella este ocupada, la nieta salga al patio que da a la calle y como pasan muchos automóviles por esa calle ya que es muy transitada ella teme que puedan atropellar a su nieta, por este  motivo esta utilizando este crédito para poner la protección del frente de la casa que además de proteger a su familia protegerá la vivienda y cuando ellas decidan salir fuera saldrán sin preocupación.
texts.en:
San Juanita is a woman who enjoys watching after her house very much.  She has progressed a little more each time with home improvement and her wish now is to install security devices on her home because she lives there with her daughter and granddaughter.  

Her fear is that when she’s busy her granddaughter might go out into the yard that leads to the street and, because many cars go by on that street because it has a lot of traffic, she fears her granddaughter could be run over.  

Because of this she is using this loan to install protective devices on the front of the house which, besides protecting the family, will also make it possible for them to leave the house unattended worry free.

loans.use: To install security devices on her house.

loans.name: Mujeres Triunfadoras De Chopuerta Group

texts.en:
Doña Silvia is 41 years old, married, and has seven children. Three of her children are currently in school. Silvia spends her time caring for her family and working as weaver. She has been weaving for over eight years. Her husband helps support the family with his work as a bricklayer. 

Silvia is requesting a loan as part of the Mujeres Triunfadoras Group (The Successful Women’s Group) to purchase materials for her work weaving girdles (sash or belt) which she sells in the market. Silvia started her business weaving and selling clothing with a small amount of personal savings and hopes to expand her business with the help of this loan. With more materials, she hopes to be able to weave more girdles and increase her sales. 

The other members of the Mujeres Triunfadores group are involved in the following businesses: animal raising, fruit sales, clothing production and sales, and everyday consumer goods sales.

loans.use: To buy materials for weaving girdles (sash/belt)

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. María del Carmen; la socia tiene 37 años de edad, casada y tiene 1 hijo; la socia se dedica a realizar trabajos manuales como recordatorios, sabanas, paneras entre otros más la socia trabaja a pedido dependiendo de lo que le soliciten a la vez la socia trabaja en el municipio de Santiago lleva ya un buen tiempo en este trabajo el cual le gusta ya que mediante este la socia saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales para su negocio como telas, hilos, agujas entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
María del Carmen, 37, is a member of the “PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN” communal bank located in Cusco district which belongs to Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is married and has a son.  She makes handicrafts like keepsakes, sheets and bread baskets, among others.  She works depending on orders she has; she’s also employed by the City of Santiago.  She’s had this job for some time now and she enjoys it because she’s able to support her family through it.

She is asking for a loan to buy supplies for the business like: fabric, thread and needles, among others.  She is happy with the loan and commits to repay.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her business like: fabric, thread and needles, among others.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy seeds to prepare snacks.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es: Pedro M. S. de 47 años de edad, reside en el municipio de San Martín en el departamento de San Salvador. El vive junto a su esposa la cual se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, así mismo vive junto a dos hijos menores de edad. Pedro es una persona muy trabajadora, la cual se dedica de lleno a su negocio, el cual está ubicado en su casa de habitación, en el que se dedica a la elaboración de ropa por mayor, la cual comercializa en diferentes mercados de San Salvador junto a su esposa. Pedro solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir aún más en su venta de ropa, comprando tela por mayor, hilos y botones, de manera que pueda producir mayor cantidad de prendas de vestir. Con esto Pedro desea mejorar la estabilidad económica de su familiar.
texts.en:
Pedro M. S. is 47 years old and lives in the town of San Martín in the department of San Salvador.  He lives with his wife, who devotes her time to the household chores, and their two young children.  Pedro is a very hard-working person who works full time at his business making clothing.  His business is located in his home and he and his wife sell the clothing wholesale at the different markets in San Salvador.  

Pedro is requesting a loan so that he will have the money necessary to invest even more in his clothing sales.  He will purchase wholesale fabric, thread and buttons so he can make more clothing.   Pedro hopes that this will provide his family with greater financial security.

loans.use: To purchase fabric, thread and buttons to make more clothing

loans.name: Edgar Percy

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Edgar Percy; el tiene 68 años de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; el socio es trabajador cesante de una empresa privada, el socio cuenta con un carrito que a veces suele trabajarlo brindando el servicio de taxi, el socio es una persona bien alegre y entusiasta con muchas ganas de seguir adelante por su familia, ahora el socio desea comprar una congeladora para así poder alquilarlo y tener otro ingreso mas.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de un congelador para  poder alquilarlo y de esta manera sacar un dinero extra.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Sr. Edgar Percy is a member of the Communal Bank “Patron San Sebastian” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

He is 68 years old, married, and has three children. Edgar was released from his job at a private company. He now has a small automobile that he occasionally uses to provide taxi services. Edgar is a cheerful individual and enthusiastic about moving ahead with his family. Now he wants to buy a freezer that he can rent out to generate additional income.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy a freezer that can be rented out to earn some extra money. Edgar is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: Purchase a freezer that he can rent out for extra income

loans.name: Carlos Andrés

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Carlos Andrés; el tiene 41 años de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; el socio es administrador de profesión y trabaja de forma independiente administrando algunas pequeñas empresas, el socio es una persona bien alegre y entusiasta con muchas ganas de seguir adelante por su familia.

El socio solicita el préstamo para uso personal (no especifico).

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Sr. Carlos Andrés is a member of the Communal Bank “Patron San Sebastian” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

He is 41 years old, married, and has two children. Carlos works independently and manages a few small businesses. He is a cheerful person who is enthusiastic about moving forward with his family.

The loan he is requesting is for personal use (no specifics were given). Carlos is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: Personal use

loans.name: Flor De Margarita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOQ ALLPA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Flor; La socia tiene 35 años de edad, la socia  es divorciada,  tiene 2 hijos, el menor de 4 meses, la socia trabaja  en artesanía ella en el mes de abril tiene programado vender sus artesanías, para lo cual invertirá en la compra de artesanía y en la compra de materiales para elaborar diferentes tipos de trabajos en arcilla, la socia trabaja desde su casa elaborando diferentes trabajos en arcillas y decorando con óxidos naturales, la socia también confecciona trajes típicos, y es secretaria  medio tiempo en una institución privada, la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para elaborar la artesanía. 

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Flor is a member of the Communal Bank “Mosoq Allpa” which is located in the District of Huanchac, Province and Department of Cusco.

She is 35 years old, divorced, and has two children, the youngest being four months old. Flor works as an artisan. In April she plans to sell her creations, but she needs to invest in the purchase of materials for making different types of clay pieces. Flor works from home, making different clay pieces that she decorates with natural oxides. She also makes traditional costumes and works part-time as a secretary for a private institution. The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of materials used in making her crafts.

Flor is happy with the loan that was provided and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase materials used for making crafts

loans.name: Rosa Angelica Kelma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosa Angélica; la socia tiene 61 años de edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia tiene su propio hotel el cual ya tiene varios años trabajando en el sector turismo, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante ya que su hotel le a traído varias satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, la socia un tiene algunos proyectos para seguir mejorando su hotel y la calidad de servicio que brinda.

La socia solicita el préstamo para su uso personal y para algunos detalles que necesita su hotel.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rosa Angélica is a member of the Communal Bank “Patron San Sebastian” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 61 years old, married, and has three children. Rosa owns a hotel and has several years of experience in the tourism industry. She is a cheerful individual who is eager to move forward. Her hotel has given her financial as well as personal satisfaction. Rosa is undertaking a few projects to improve her hotel and the quality of service she provides.

The loan she is requesting will be used for a few details that are needed in her hotel, as well as some personal expenses. Rosa is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: Pay for improvements to her hotel & some personal expenses

loans.name: Paula

texts.es: Paula, de 65 años, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de su hija mayor y sus dos nietos; y juntos se esfuerzan cada día por alcanzar el progreso. Cuando su esposo falleció, esta emprendedora dama buscó un negocio que le permitiera obtener ganancias en la tranquilidad de su hogar, pues no podía conseguir un empleo por su avanzada edad. Y desde hace algún tiempo empezó a alquilar cuartos en su casa, aunque solo tiene  dos inquilinos en la actualidad. Ella tiene grandes sueños por cumplir y desea hacerlos realidad. Su vida transcurre apacible, pues logra buenas ganancias del alquiler de dos cuartos que tiene en su casa. Para el futuro tiene muchos planes, y entre ellos se encuentra el de terminar de construir su casa, pues tiene planeado alquilar dos piezas más de su casa; de esta manera  espera generarse regulares ganancias. Es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Paula tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de material de construcción que necesita para mandar levantar las paredes de lo que será el próximo cuarto que empezara a alquilar, de esta manera espera mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Paula, age 65, lives in her own house with her grown daughter and two grandchildren. Each day they strive to make progress. When her husband passed away, this enterprising woman decided to start a business that would allow her to earn income to make her home comfortable since she is not able to get a job at her age. For some time, she has rented rooms in her house but she only has two tenants at the moment. She has grand dreams to fulfill and make reality. Paula has a peaceful life, generating good rental income from the two occupied rooms in her home. She has several plans for the future, including the completion of the construction of her house so that she can rent out two more rooms in hopes of having more regular income.

This is her second loan with MFP. Paula promises to complete her payments on time because she does not want to look bad in the eyes of those responsible who made this loan possible so that she could continue working and making progress. She plans to invest the money she requested in the purchase of necessary construction materials to erect walls for the next room she will make available for rent. Paula hopes this will improve her earnings.

loans.use: Purchase materials to build walls for a rental room

loans.name: Yolanda Maritza

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yolanda Maritza; la socia tiene 52 años de edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia es administradora de profesión ella actualmente administra un hotel por el centro de la ciudad, la socia está contenta con esta actividad ya que le permite realizar lo que le gusta, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante por su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la educación de uno de sus hijos que se encuentra en la ciudad de Lima.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Yolanda Maritza is a member of the Communal Bank “Patron San Sebastian” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 52 years old, married, and has three children. Yolanda is a manager who currently works at a hotel in the center of the city. She is happy with her job and enjoys what she does for a living. Yolanda is a cheerful person who is eager for her family to move forward.

The loan she is requesting will be invested in the education of one of her children who is attending school in the city of Lima. Yolanda is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: Pay for the educational expenses for one of her children

loans.name: Gina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOQ ALLPA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Gina; La socia tiene 31años de edad, la socia  es conviviente,  tiene 1 hijo de 9 años,  la socia trabaja   junto  a su conyugue en el taller de mecánica, ella ayuda a su pareja en el taller  en diferentes actividades, la socia desea el préstamo para invertir en su vivienda y poder mejorarla. La socia desea el préstamo para invertir en la vivienda y poder mejorarla poco a apoco.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Gina is a member of the Communal Bank “Mosoq Allpa” which is located in the District of Huanchac, Province and Department of Cusco.

She is 31 years old, in a common law marriage, and has a 9 year old child. Gina and her husband work together at an auto repair shop. She helps her husband with various duties that need to be performed in their business. Gina is requesting a loan to invest in her home and make a few improvements a little bit at a time.

She is happy with the loan that was provided and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: Home improvements

loans.name: Pamela

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Pamela; la socia tiene 20 años de edad, soltera; la socia es estudiante de la carrera de derecho de la Universidad Particular Andina del Cusco, la socia a la vez cuenta con su propio carrito el cual brinda el servicio de taxi ella lo alquila a un chofer que lo trabaje y así ella pueda pagar su universidad y algunos gastos personales que tiene, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con todas las ganas de seguir adelante. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para realizar la mantenimiento de su carrito.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Pamela is 20 years old and single. She is a law student at La Universidad Particular Andina in Cusco. Pamela owns a compact automobile that she uses to provide taxi services. She rents out the vehicle to a driver and uses the income to pay for her education and a few personal expenses. Pamela is a cheerful individual who has every intention of succeeding.

She is requesting a loan to pay for maintenance of her vehicle. Pamela is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: Pay for vehicle maintenance

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Walter; el tiene 36 años de edad y es casado y tiene 1 hijo; el socio trabaja para una entidad nacional él trabaja de lunes a viernes de 08:00am hasta las 01:00pm y de 03:00pm hasta las 07:00pm, el socio se siente muy contento con este trabajo ya que de esta forma el saca a su familia adelante y pudo realizar algunas mejoras en su casa y desea construir y mejorar su casita.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la construcción de su casa.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Sr. Walter is a member of the Communal Bank “Patron San Sebastian” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

He is 36 years old, married, and has one child. Walter works for a national entity Monday through Friday from 8am to 1pm and from 3pm to 7pm. He is happy with his job because it has enabled his family to get ahead and make a few improvements to their home. Walter wants to build and improve his house.

The loan he is requesting will be used for home construction. Walter is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: Home construction

loans.name: Lucio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Lucio; el tiene 28 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; el socio trabaja en un taller de mecánica de nombre Divi Motors el trabaja de lunes a sábado por las mañanas y tardes, el socio anteriormente trabajaba en otras entidades con la finalidad de ahorrar su dinero y comprarse un terrenito para su familia o bien poner un negocio y actualmente está trabajando y ahorrando con este fin, el socio es una persona bien alegre y entusiasta con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia.

El socio solicita el préstamo para su uso personal como ahorrar para comprarse un terreno o finalmente poner algún negocio propio.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Sr. Lucio is a member of the Communal Bank “Patron San Sebastian” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

He is 28 years old, in a common law marriage, and has two children. Lucio is employed at an auto repair shop called Divi Motors where he works Monday through Saturday in the morning and afternoon. He previously worked at other entities so that he could save some money to buy a small plot of land for his family or start a business. Lucio is currently working and saving toward this goal. He is a cheerful person who is enthusiastic about moving forward with this family.

The loan he is requesting is for personal use. He will save the money toward the purchase of a piece of land and eventually for starting his own business. Lucio is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: The funds will be saved toward the purchase of a piece of land and eventually for starting his own business

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita, de 39 años. Vive en concubinato con Horacio, con quien tiene 2 hijos a los cuales cuida en unión familiar en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad de guacamayo (selva central peruana). Su esfuerzo y dedicación durante estos 10 años, le sirvieron para obtener 4 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas, donde siembra naranja, cacao y plátanos. Los cuales después de cada cosecha los comercializan en el mercado número 2 de la ciudad de Pichanaki. Asimismo tiene una tienda de comestibles, donde vende bebidas, y frutas por unidad, pero según menciona baja 2 veces a la semana al mercado a vender frutas de temporada por kilos, de esa manera obtiene un dinero extra. Ahora ella se está preparando para su próxima cosecha de plátanos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “nuevo amanecer de guacamayo”, y este es el primer crédito  tiene con MFP, donde se compromete a trabajar de manera conjunta por el progreso de su asociación. Margarita, invertirá el crédito en la compra de 200 a 300 kilos de plátanos, los cuales venderá por kilos en el mercado de minoristas de su ciudad.
texts.en:
Margarita is 39 years old and lives in cohabitation with Horacio, with whom she has two children.  They live together in their own house in the community of Guacamayo in the Central Peruvian jungle.  Their efforts and dedication the last ten years has given them four hectares of agricultural land where they plant oranges, cacao, and bananas.  After each harvest, the sell their produce in the number 2 market in the city of Pichanaki.

Margarita also has a grocery store where she sells drinks and fruit by the unit.  Twice a week she goes to the market to sell seasonal fruit by the kilo to gain extra money.  Now she is preparing for their next crop of bananas.  She belongs to the communal bank "Nuevo Amanecer Guacamayo," (New Dawn Guacamayo), and this is her first loan with MFP.  She is committed to working together for the progress of their partnership.  

Margarita will use the requested loan to buy 200 to 300 kilos of bananas, which she will sell by the kilo in the retail market of her city.

loans.use: To buy 300 kilos of bananas for retail sale.

loans.name: Maria Gabriela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOQ ALLPA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Gabriela; La socia tiene 50 años de edad, la socia  es casada,  tiene 3 hijos,  la socia trabaja en la universidad, ella trabaja en la parte administrativa, la socia es miembro del banco comunal desde los inicios y ella en esta oportunidad desea el crédito para invertir en su vivienda. La socia desea mejorar su vivienda, ella comprara algunos muebles para la casa.  La socia desea el préstamo para invertir en la vivienda y poder mejorarla poco a apoco.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: Maria Gabriela belongs to the "Mosoq Allpa" community bank in the district of Huanchac, province of Cusco, Peru. She is 50 years old, married and has three children. She works in the administrative department at a university. Maria Gabriela has been a member of the community bank since its inception and at this time she is requesting the loan to invest in her home. She wants to make improvements to her home by purchasing some furniture items. Maria Gabriela wants to invest in her home so she can be able to make improvements to it little by little. She feels happy that the loan has been approved and promises to make her payments in the established period.

loans.use: Purchase furniture for her home

loans.name: Maricela

texts.es: La Sra. Maricela B., es una persona muy respetable y responsable, por lo que en este tiempo poco  a poco ella ha ido acondicionado su domicilio pero le falta a una parte de su casa el  impermeabilizado y  pensando en estos tiempos de lluvia ella desea cubrir  esta  necesidad así como también quiere protegerla de la inseguridad poniendo unas  protecciones  a  su hogar  ya  que  próximamente  viajara  fuera de la ciudad  a visitar a  sus familiares y  de  esta  manera podrá  hacerlo  con mayor  tranquilidad.
texts.en: Maricela B. is a very respectable and responsible person who has been making improvements to her home little by little. Currently part of her home isn't waterproof, and during this rainy season Marciela wants to fix that. She always wants to install some protections to make her home more secure since she will soon be traveling outside of the city to visit her relatives and in this way she can do so with more peace of mind.

loans.use: Waterproof her home and make it more secure

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOQ ALLPA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Graciela; La socia es separada,  tiene 7 hijos, tres de ellos aún viven con la socia, ella tiene una tienda abarrotes, la socia tiene la ayuda de sus hijas para atender el negocio, la socia desea implementar su tienda y comprar al por mayor, harina, azúcar, arroz, leche, aceite, papa, galletas, fideos y un poco de verduras para surtir el negocio, la socia tiene un dinero ahorrado y más el que requiere podrá comprar la mercadería para trabajar estos meses. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos y de este modo implementar su tienda.

 La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: Graciela belongs to the "Mosoq Allpa" community bank in the district of Huanchac, Cusco, Peru. She is divorced and has seven children, three of whom still live with her. Graciela runs a convenience store, and her daughters help her tend to the business. Graciela wishes to set up her shop by buying at wholesale flour, sugar, rice, milk, oil, potatoes, cookies, noodles and a few vegetables to stock her store. She has some money saved and more than she needs to be able to buy merchandise for the next few months. She is requesting the loan to purchase products and in this way set up her store. Graciela is happy that the loan has been authorized and promises to make her payments in the established period.

loans.use: Purchase products to set up her convenience store

loans.name: Mujeres De Pacanac Group

texts.es: doña Juana I. Tzún, tiene 35 años D. edad, es casada, tiene tres hijos D. los cuales los tres estudian, es una persona que no tuvo ningún año D. escolaridad, tiene deseos D. superacion, se dedica a vender frutas, por esa razon reunió a caterce compañeras mas formar un grupo y solicitar un prestamo a ASDIR e invertirlo como capital D. tabajo en cada una D. las actividades que realizan cada integrante como: vender ropa, crianza D. animales, venta D. alimentos, elaboración D. canastas, elaboración D. sobrefundas y pabellones, esperan con esta inversiòn mejorar sus ingresos y su condición D. vida.
texts.en:
Doña Juana I. Tzún is 35 years old, married, and has three children who are in school. Although she did not have the opportunity to attend school, Juana possesses the desire to succeed. She sells fruit to earn a living. For this reason, she met with fourteen other members to form a group so that they could request a loan from Asociación ASDIR. They will invest the money as operating capital in each of their businesses. These incluD. selling clothes, raising animals, selling food, making baskets, and embroidering pillowcases and banners.

The members hope this investment will improve their incomes and their living conditions.

loans.use: Operating capital

loans.name: Las Flores De Yanacona Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “LAS FLORES DE YANACONA”; el banco  comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac,  provincia y departamento del Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yaneth; La socia tiene 22 años de edad, la socia es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en el terminal terrestre en Urubamba, ella es controladora de los buses y combis que van a diferentes puntos ida y vuelta en el valle sagrado, la socia también se dedica a criar animales menores como cuyes, aves de corral; La socia controla las horas de netrada y salida de los diferentes carros; ella  se encarga de atender a sus niños mientras el conyugue de ella está trabajando en Machupicchu en el area de house keeping en un hotel de la zona, ellos se reunen cada ves que el conyugue sale de día libre, juntos trabajan para darles a sus hijos todo lo mejor y darles sobre todo una buena educación y alimento. La socia solicita el prestamo para poder invertir en la compra de animales menores para incrementar su venta y apoyar su economía familiar.


Los otros socios se dedican la venta de verduras, a la venta de chicha de maíz blanco y amarillo, a la crianza de animales menores, a la aagricultura, a trabajos como empleados en diferentes lugares privados como hospedajes.

La socia valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Yaneth belongs to the Communal Bank “Las Flores de Yanacona” (The Flowers of Yanacona) which is in the District of Huanchac, Province and Department of Cusco.

She is 22 years old, in a common law marriage, and has two children. Yaneth works at the bus station in Urubamba as a traffic controller. She is responsible for directing buses and vans that come from and leave for different points within the Sacred Valley. Yaneth also raises small animals such as guinea pigs and poultry. She controls the flow of traffic by determining when different vehicles can enter and exit. Yaneth is also responsible for looking after her children while her husband works in Machupicchu in the housekeeping department for a local hotel. She and her husband are able to get together on his day off. They work together to provide their children all the best, which includes a good education and food to eat. Yaneth is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of more animals so that she can increase her sales and help with the family finances.

The other members sell vegetables, sell “chicha” (a type of beverage) made of white and yellow corn, raise animals, grow crops, and work as employees for different private establishments such as boarding houses.

Yaneth values her loan and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: Invest in the purchase of small animals

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es: Manuela, de 43 años, es una valerosa madre soltera de 4 hijos a los que cuida con mucho amor y cariño en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Kivinaki (selva central peruana). El rostro serio de está trabajadora mujer, denota su constante lucha por sacar adelante a sus hijos. Desde las primeras horas del día como hace 10 años, se dirige a cuidar sus cultivos de café y naranja, los cuales le proporcionan buenas ganancias en las negociaciones que realiza a los intermediarios que visitan sus 3 hectáreas, en cada cosecha. Paralelo a esta actividad, ella realiza jornadas de trabajo, en cultivos de sus vecinos; quienes le pagan un dinero extra por su trabajo. Ahora está planeando sembrar en mayores cantidades, pues requiere de mayor capital. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “flor de almendra”, y este es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, donde está segura podrá alcanzar sus objetivos. Manuela, está pensando utilizar el crédito en arreglar el auto que tiene, para incursionar en el trasporte público cubriendo las rutas Kivinaki-Cerro Picaflor.
texts.en:
Manuela, age 43, is a valiant single mother who cares for her four children with much love and affection. She lives in her own home in the native community of Kivinaki in the central Peruvian jungle. The serious demeanor of this hardworking woman indicates the constant struggle she faces to move her children forward. For the past ten years, Manuela has been caring for her coffee and orange crops each day beginning in the early morning hours. These crops have resulted in good earnings as a result of her negotiations with the intermediaries who visit her three hectares of land during the harvest season. In addition to her own farm, Manuela works as a laborer in cultivating the crops of her neighbors who pay her extra money for her work. Now she plans to grow her crops in greater quantities, but she needs more capital.

Manuela is a member of the Communal Bank “Flor de Almendra” (Almond Blossom). This is her first loan with MFP. She is confident that her group can accomplish its objectives. Manuela will use her loan to repair her automobile since she plans to enter the public transportation sector by offering services along the routes betweeen Kivinaki and Cerro Picaflor.

loans.use: Pay for vehicle repairs so that she can start providing transportation services

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Luz Marina; la socia tiene 49 años de edad, casada y tiene 2 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de elaboración de mermeladas de fresa, mango, sauco, durazno entre otros y de esta forma tener más variedad que ofrecer a sus clientas la socia trabaja a pedido, la socia lleva años en este negocio del cual se siente feliz ya que mediante esta actividad ella saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos como frutas de platano, fresa, mango, azúcar entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This is Sra. Luz Mariana. She is 49 years old, married, and has two children. Luz divides her time between her daily activities and making marmalade out of strawberries, mangoes, elderberries, peaches, and other fruits. She works according to orders and tries to offer a wide variety to her customers. Luz has been in this business for many years and is pleased that what she has accomplished has helped her family move forward.

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as bananas, strawberries, mangoes, sugar, and other ingredients. Luz is happy to receive this loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients for making marmalade

loans.name: Flora

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Flora; la socia tiene 42 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias realizando el lavado de ropa ella trabaja de acuerdo a sus clientes que le solicitan a la vez la socia cuenta con un carrito que ofrece el servicio de taxi siendo su esposo quien maneja este carrito y ella administra, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro y para comprar algunos accesorios que necesita.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This is Sra. Flora. She is 42 years old, in a common law marriage, and has three children. Flora divides her time between her daily activities and providing laundry services based on her customers’ requests. She owns a compact car that her husband drives for providing taxi services. Flora is a cheerful person who is eager to move forward. She is requesting a loan to maintain her vehicle and buy some necessary accessories.

Flora is happy to receive this loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: Pay for vehicle maintenance & purchase accessories for her taxi

loans.name: Oliver

texts.es: Oliver, de 26 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador. Vive junto a su papá Carlos y su mamá Catalina en la comunidad de guacamayo (selva central peruana). Hace 10 años que se dedica a la siembra de cítricos como: naranja, tangelo, asimismo siembra cacao, los cuales vende en el mercado de frutas de Pichanaki. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo son los días donde quita la maleza de sus cultivos, pues gusta de verlos limpios. Ahora en la campaña de café que se avecina, comenzará a trabajar como peón en diferentes cultivos de café. Él pertenece al banco comunal “nuevo amanecer de guacamayo”, y este es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, donde se compromete a ser responsable y cumplido con su banco comunal. Oliver, invertirá el crédito en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgánico los cuales esparcirá entre sus cultivos de cítricos que cosechará el próximo mes.
texts.en:
Oliver, age 26, is a single hardworking gentleman. He lives with his father Carlos and mother Catalina in the community of Guacamayo in the central Peruvian jungle. For the past ten years he has cultivated citrus crops such as oranges and tangelos. In addition, he grows cacao. Oliver sells his fruits at the market in Pichanaki. What he enjoys most about his work are the days he sets aside for pulling weeds because he likes seeing clean fields. Now that the coffee season is approaching, he will begin work as a laborer for different coffee farms.

Oliver is a member of the Communal Bank “Nuever Amanecer de Guacamayo” (New Dawn of Guacamayo). This is his first loan with MFP. He promises to be responsible and committed in his Communal Bank. Oliver will invest this loan in the purchase of several sacks of organic fertilizers to apply on his citrus crops that will be harvested next month.

loans.use: Purchase sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Hermenegilda   Augusta

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Hermenegilda ; la socia tiene 50 años de edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia se dedica a la crianza de animales como cuyes y gallinas, también cuenta con un local amplio el cual lo alquila para los diferentes compromisos que se realizan como matrimonios, fiestas de 15 años fiestas de promoción entre otros, a la vez la socia trabaja en una joyería por el centro de la ciudad siendo estas actividades que realiza para mantener a su familia que son su motivo de seguir adelante. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar alimento para sus animales y para algunos arreglos en su local.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This is Sra. Hermenegilda. She is 50 years old, married, and has three children. Hermenegilda raises animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. She also has a banquet hall that she rents out for various events such as weddings, quinceañeras, graduations, and other occasions. Hermenegilda works at a jewelry store in the center of the city. She engages in all of these business activities so that she can support her family in hopes of moving them forward.

Hermenegilda is requesting a loan to purchase feed for her animals and make a few repairs to her banquet hall. She is happy with this loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: Purchase animal feed & make repairs to her banquet hall

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is a 58-year-old widow who supports her family by operating a tricycle transport business and a livestock business.  She lives in the municipality of Aborlan, Palawan. Rosemarie joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2007 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past seven loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Rosemarie has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 17,000 helped her earn a monthly profit of PHP 15,000, uplifting the family's standard of living. This time, for her eighth loan, she is borrowing PHP 20,000 to buy an additional sidecar for her new motorcycle so that she can continue to save up for future expansion of her business. Rosemarie is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 

About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed upon a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by joining the NWTF Kiva lending team at http://www.kiva.org/team/nwtf_philippines

loans.use: To purchase a sidecar for her new motorcycle

loans.name: Visitacion

texts.en:
Visitacion is a married woman who lives in Bais City, Negros Oriental. She earns her living by selling vegetables.  Her husband Hermoso, who is 56 years old, works as a vendor to earn his living and helps in his wife's business activities.  They have six children who are between 13 and 34 years old.  Visitacion joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2006 because she aspired for something better for her family.  With the help of her past eight loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Visitacion has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 19,500 helped her earn a monthly profit of PHP 7,000, thus uplifting the family's standard of living. This time, for her ninth loan, she is borrowing PHP 24,000 to purchase more stock to sell so that she can continue to save up for the future education of her children.  Visitacion is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 

About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed upon a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by joining the NWTF Kiva lending team at http://www.kiva.org/team/nwtf_philippines

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell

loans.name: Francia

texts.en:
Francia is a 41-year-old married woman who supports her family by fish vending/fishing and direct selling (Avon/Natasha).  She lives in Quezon, Palawan. She has been a member of NWTF-Project Dungganon since 2004 and has improved her living conditions with the help of her loans from NWTF and through her own efforts. By working hard in her businesses, she is gradually making her family more economically stable. She now earns an average monthly income of PHP 8,000. Francia is borrowing PHP 10,000 to fund her business operations.  This will be her 16th loan from NWTF-Project Dungganon. Her previous loan of PHP 9,000, which she paid off well within its term, was just another step in her journey toward economic freedom. Francia aspires to elevate her family's living conditions and ensure their future wellbeing by following the Dungganon way. 

About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed upon a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by joining the NWTF Kiva lending team at http://www.kiva.org/team/nwtf_philippines

loans.use: To fund her business operations

loans.name: Jonife

texts.en:
Jonife is a 26-year-old single woman who supports her family by selling fruits and vegetables and operating a general store.  She lives in the municipality of Narra, Palawan. Jonife joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2006 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past eight loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Jonife has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 25,000 helped her earn a monthly profit of PHP 6,800, uplifting the family's standard of living.  This time, for her ninth loan, she is borrowing PHP 29,000 to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables to sell so that she can continue to save up for the future expansion of her business. Jonife is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 

About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed upon a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by joining the NWTF Kiva lending team at http://www.kiva.org/team/nwtf_philippines

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is a married woman who lives in Narra, Palawan. She earns her living by selling vegetables. Her husband Freddie, who is 44 years old, works as a tricycle driver to earn his living. They have five children who are between 8 and 21 years old. Gemma joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2004 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past 20 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Gemma has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 20,000 helped her earn a monthly profit of PHP 10,000, uplifting the family's standard of living. This time, for her 21st loan, she is borrowing PHP 20,000 to buy more vegetables to sell so that she can continue to save up for her children's education & household improvements. Gemma is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 

About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed upon a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by joining the NWTF Kiva lending team at http://www.kiva.org/team/nwtf_philippines

loans.use: To fund her business operations

loans.name: Ou

texts.en:
Ou O. is a 43-year-old married woman who resides in the province of Kompong Cham. She can make around $1.50 in profit each day from her farming business. She has a life partner in her husband, who also works in the same business. 

The couple is blessed with five children; four are single and the other one is married and now lives in their own home. Two of their kids are working in the garment factory on a formal monthly salary. 

Because it is the harvesting season, Ou O. needs capital while prices are low to purchase many sacks of rice to store for later resale. With the rest of the funds, she will buy a new ladder in order to replace a broken one.

loans.use: To stock up on rice while prices are low

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is a married woman who lives in Aborlan, Palawan. She earns her living by operating three business ventures:  a general store, food vending and tricycle transport.  Her husband Belindo, who is 51 years old, works as a tricycle driver to earn his living and helps in his wife's business activities.  They have five children who are between 9 and 22 years old. Myrna joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2003 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past 15 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Myrna has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 28,000 helped her earn a monthly profit of PHP 15,000, uplifting the family's standard of living. This time, for her 16th loan, she is borrowing PHP 29,000 to buy additional products to sell so that she can continue to save up for the future education of her children and expansion of her business. Myrna is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 

About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed upon a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by joining the NWTF Kiva lending team at http://www.kiva.org/team/nwtf_philippines

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita is a 46-year-old married woman who supports her family by operating a food stall and a farming business.  She lives in the municipality of Narra, Palawan.
